title: Bhimtal
review: Very beautiful place... Nice weather good view everything good... Good food well behave staff.. Bhimtal

title: Family Picnic
review: Very Bright Sunny Morning , no breeze , quiet waters in the lake , had a long boating session , enjoyed the scenic view around.

title: BHIMTAL-AN ESSENTIAL TIME-OUT
review: Bhimtal is a very beautiful place. Not very crowded in February  , it's really very peaceful to stroll around bhimtal lake. There are so many tourist destination near bhimtal like - Khurpatal, kilbery, naukuchiyatal ,Nainital , bhowali , Mukteshwar and Sattal. One can have fun of Paragliding too here. In all very nice place to have a soul searching.

title: Twin city lake is in apathy state
review: In case you have visited Nainital, your visit to Bhimtal lake will be disappointing. The lake is not well maintained, the ferry area are full of garbage, filth and lack of proper public behaviour.

title: Bhimtal
review: The lake is very well maintained with lovely surroundings. It’s a quite place away from the noise and crowd of a regular tourist destination. You can also enjoy a boat ride in the lake

title: Bhimtal
review: Bhimtal is a beautiful town in Nainital district in the state of Uttarakhand, India, situated at an altitude of 1370 meters above sea level and is about 22 kilometers from Nainital. The major attraction in Bhimtal is the Bhimtal Lake, which has an island at its centre.Its a peaceful place and best escape from the city life.6-7 hours drive from Delhi.

title: The Biggest lake in the Nainital district
review: A superb place to go and enjoy in the lap of nature. Try Maggi,tea and eggs here. One should also try shopping in the market with nominal rates.

title: Great place
review: Amazing place to relax and for boating, Thanks to ayshatours.com travels for making the itinerary simpler and affordable

title: Lake
review: You can walk near the lake nice and quiet but you have take care of children evening is pleasant also you can do boating

title: Awesome trip by Jukaso Journeys
review: A short trip to the land of God's. I visited Bhimtal, naukuchiyatal, Nainital and pangot. The best Bhimtal- it had been heated though within the month of June, however, an incredible getaway of approx 300kms from Delhi.

title: The largest lake in the area
review: This is the largest among the many lakes in the area.

title: The stunnig lake of bhimtal
review: Bhimtal Lake is a beautiful lake with amazing views from all around the lake . Boating takes place every day . The charges are 300 per boat . Once a try is must as we can witness some breathtaking viewss of the lake . The best time can be nov to feb as it becomes hot sometimes and we need some break from our daily life . So go and have some good quality time at this stunning lake of Bhimtal ..

title: Bhimtal lake
review: I prefer bhimtal over nanital for those who love tranquil places over crowded. If your budget is quite tight then i suggest to do boating at naukuchiatal instead of bhimtal lake. The water activities are very few and expensive here.

title: Beautiful Mountain Lake
review: On my drives to Jungliya or Ramgarh I usually pass by Bhimtal and  this lake is always a sight I love. During monsoons it fills up to the brim and looks really fascinating.  Make sure you get a pictures by this lake.You won't be disappointed.

title: Bhimtal lake is blissful.
review: The lake is such a treat to the eyes. It is divinely beautiful. Boat ride here is a must. Also visit the Mahadev Mandir in the vicinity after crossing the small dam. You will get breathtaking views from there.

title: Nainital alternative
review: The lake is a less crowded alternative to the better known Nainital, which is kind of stressful to visit during season due to large numbers of tourists and vehicles. The scenery is the great and facilities are similar (boating, of course). The roads need improvement, the local council should provide a decent pedestrian walk around the lake (currently there is a grave danger of being run over) and a few outdoor cafes would add to the atmosphere.

title: Bhimtal
review: Visited lake on January 1st 2019....its a nice place for zorbing and kayaking.These are not there in Nainital.But as such this place is not as picturesque as nainital.kids get bored rest of the time.

title: Better than Nainital
review: This lake is less crowded as compared to Nainital. If you like a calm and serene spot as compared to a crowded one, spend more time at Bhimtal and Naukuchiatal instead of Nainital. You should combine your Bhimtal trip with Saatal and Naukuchiatal.

title: Go for boating there
review: It’s a good lake I really enjoyed the boating there. There is one more activity of crossing lake hanging over  a rope. Local shops are there for cheaper shopping. Good place to see.

title: Beautiful and serene
review: We went for a birding hike around this lovely blue Lake, it was extremely pleasant and relaxing. The terrain was pretty easy even for people with slight mobility issues.

title: Good to stay
review: Bhimtal lake is very neat and clean place , you can enjoy boating ,house riding and the main attraction is adventure sports like hot air balloon , biking, zipline etc, you can feed the  ducks here ,accommodation is cheaper then nanital location is good

title: lake with an island
review: iT is the biggest lake in this lake region. There is small island in the middle of the lake. You can take a boat and visit the island.  There are some water sports which can be enjoyed as well.

title: Beautiful and less crowded
review: The view of the lake surrounded by mountains is very beautiful. One can enjoy activities like boating here. Bhimtal is quite bigger in size and much more peaceful as its less crowded as compared to Nanital.

title: Boat ride
review: Visted after 10 years, the place has become much crowded but still remains better than nainital as this is more peaceful and riding boat here is fun.

title: Awesome boating experience..
review: It was a great experience boating amongst the hills ... It was such a beautiful place.... Boats are available at cheap prices and this is a must do activity... Highly recommended

title: Worth Visiting
review: We find it better than the Nainital Lake, it is more clean, big and peaceful . parking is an issue but that can be ignored as that is common at all the places

title: A must visit place
review: A place where you can relax and could satisfy your soul.

title: Serene lake with historical temples
review: Good clean lake, may enjoy boating, walk beside the lake is must; we stayed in royal rosette, jus on the bank of the lake; so enjoyed the walk in the morning. We watched lot of himalayan birds, malta (local citrus fruit) juice, sikanji and maagi are must haves from the local vendors. lake is most beautiful from the victoria dam; and lahsuni chicken kabab from the "Variety Resturant"  should not be missed.

title: Bhimtal the serene lake
review: This is one of the oldest place and use to be on the silk route. Currently it is near Kathgodam Rly station on the way to Nainital, Pithoragarh etc. The lake is the centre of attraction of this place. It has boating, an acquarium in the middle of the lake. The view is excellent and one spend a quiet time on the banks and enjoy the beauty. There are number of hotels with rooms/ balconies facing towards the lake. It is much better than Nainital which of late is over crowded.

title: Best place for peaceful stay .
review: best place. Bhimtal is one of the largest lake in Nainital District. Kayaking is also available in Bhimtal.

title: Peaceful place
review: This place is very serene and peaceful and away from the busy city life. You can spend nice time with the family here.

title: Calm and Serene Bhimtal lake !
review: It's one of the most beautiful lakes I have ever seen. Too calm and serene. One can look at it for hours and cannot get bored. We went there in rainy season and it's all the more beautiful view.

title: Good to visit
review: Bhimtal lake is a good to go place. Lake is very big and nearby scenery is also good. It is in the middle of bhimtal city, hence good reachability.

title: Serenity scenic
review: Best lake, best place , scenic , calm place ..... Out of clutter of Nainital . Boating is must there

title: Nice place
review: Good scenic views. Waterfalls lakes hills and clouds. Can do boating and roam around the lake. Path from nainital to bhimtal is too good

title: Good
review: Its good 2nd best after nainital lake .. you can take boat ride.. nice to take a walk around the lake ..

title: Very nice!!!!
review: Lake is superb in between mountains. Boating in lake refreshing.nakuchiyatal lake is near to bhimtal and activities like zipline are there. Very nice place.

title: Nice lake
review: lake is superb,Boating is allowed in nearby nakuchiyatal .This quite large compared to Nainital.Small island in the middle.This overall area needs a bit of improvement

title: Large picturesque lake!
review: Bhimtal lake is quite large as compared to the famous Naini lake in Nainital. There is small island in the middle of the lake which looks beautiful from the banks. A wonderful place for clicking pictures and spending quiet time at the bank. Boating options are limited and is little expensive.

title: Calm lake
review: Very cam but very good for people who require silence all around. Neat and clean. But more improvement required.

title: Nice quiet place
review: The place is very quite calm and relaxing. One can enjoy the nature and relax. However cleanliness can be improved

title: Good lake with scenic beauty
review: Bhimtal is famous for its lake. It is a huge and clean lake. Bhimtal Lake is less crowded than Nainital Lake so you can enjoy this lake beauty in peace. Many types of boats are available here but price are on higher side as compared to Nainital lake boats. Lots of eateries shop around the lake. There is a small fish aquarium in middle of the lake. One have to pay parking fees of 50 rs to enter your car in lake area.

title: Mesmerising
review: Perfect destination for the travel bugs who love scenic views and photographers!! Adventure sports like paragliding is available in the winters.

title: the cleaning has reduced the water level
review: it's a great place to be at but we were a bit disappointed to see the level go so low... Bhimtal has many wonderful hotels and eating joints but the lake remains the evergreen place to be at  :0

title: Just loved the whole aura of the place
review: What a lovely sight to be at! Magnificent view, a never ending lake, eateries serving us our favourite hill side view like Maggi and Fried rice. We stopped by the lake for sometime while coming back from Ranikhet and just loved it. The weather was a little foggy and the vapours made it even more delightful. There was boating happening as well. Just wished we had more time in hand so that we can do could have done boating as well.

title: Close to Nature
review: This is the most beautiful place in Nanital, the cloud surrounding the valley can be seen in all the direction; boat ride with charge 150/- per boat max 4 people, there are some option of speedboat and else at premium pricing

title: Mesmerizing
review: It's beautiful and mesmerizing Bhimtal Lake. Clean and Scenic. Boating also available. Good people. Good place.

title: Nice and less crowded
review: this is a small lake but still it is very beautiful. very close to nature and very less crwoded. we should definitely try to go there and enjoy the view.

title: Beautiful lake
review: compare to Nainital, more peaceful, with less people. But Nainital prices are cheaper than Bhimtal. Here u can try pedal boating and simple boating. Price-300₹ per 30 minutes ( but actually u can use for 40 min. Easily)

title: Trip to Bhimtal
review: We stayed in royal rosset hotel just OPP to lake . The hotel staff is very nice and cooperative . I recommend to stay in this hotel

title: GOOD WEEKEND TRIP
review: On the way to Ranikhet we stayed in Bhimtal as well. Lake is quiet calm and relaxing. Less crowded and smaller than Nainital Lake. There isn’t much to do here apart from paragliding (don’t know how good it is) and a drive through the lake in one of their pedal boats. Around 300 RS for 40 minutes trip. We did go for a boat ride in the evening and its worth. However cleanliness around the lake is a nightmare. Aquarium inside lake is supposed to be an added attraction. But the state of that aquarium is horrible.

title: Largest Lake in the lake town area
review: Nice lake with lovely boating facility. Not so crowded like Nainital. Aquarium inside lake is an added attraction. The Aquarium is not that much good, but the lake is nice.

title: a perfect getaway
review: a perfect getaway from the regular hustle bustle and Bhimtal lake is peaceful place. It also offers pedal boating and Water Ball.

title: Clean waters, well kept
review: Well kept lake, Bhimtal is much better than Nainital if you are looking for a relaxed holiday.  There are about 80 ducks who swim in a line

title: Well maintained lake
review: A huge well maintained lake in between mountains. It houses an aquarium in the centre. People enjoy boating and other water sports here. A lot of street food options available

title: Okay for one time visit
review: As name suggests this one is the main lake in Bhimtal. Surrounded by market and food stalls, at peak time you will find this place a bit crowded. However if you are in Bhimtal, then you have to visit there.

title: Beautiful big lake visited by @GhumantuBaba
review: This is one of the famous few lakes in the Nainital region.

title: Scenic quiet lake
review: Huge, in fact the largest lake of UK. Good boating experience and nice to chat with boatman. Aquarium trip was a disappointment, not recommended.

title: Unique boating experience
review: Many types of boats available for boating at reasonable prices... water is not so clean but scenery is good

title: Wah
review: One of the best lake in Nainital little away from the main city about 10 to 15 km but worth reaching there very good experience of boating

title: Attractive Lake
review: This lake seems bigger than Nainital. The surrounding areas are less crowded making it easier to walk.

title: Beautiful
review: It's a nice lake and the weather also most of the times is amazing. We did Kayaking here and it was fun.

title: Lake less crowded
review: Bhimtal is the place if you want to enjoy boat ride at kumaon hills. Boat rides here are bit expensive. There are paddle boats, kayaks and wooden boats with a person rowing. I opted for wooden one which costs 250 rs per boat for 3 adults max. In entire lake, there are 4 parties who arrange these boating at different parts of the lake.

title: Nice well maintained lake
review: Named after Bhim from the Mahabharata, this lake is the main attraction of Bhimtal city. Located around 20 km from Kathgodam railway station it was created around early 1900's during the British period as part of a dam. It is one of the main source of water for the city. Compared to Naini lake in Nainital, it is less crowded and well maintained. A nice place to spend time with friends and family.

title: Crowded
review: Great lake with clean water but crowded. Worth a visit and walk around. Has activities for kids like Zorbing, boating. They need to limit the car access and make it more pedestrian friendly and quieter.

title: Quiet and Peaceful!
review: Definitely a better Option than Nainital as Nainital is very crowded and packed even on weekdays , Has a few Boating Options like Kayaks , Peddle Boats , also Boats with Boatmen who row you around the Lake , has a Dam towards one side where there is an Ancient Shiva Temple , access however to that temple is by a short walk. Lake has a few Restaurants and small food stalls. Parking is a problem on Weekends but during season weekdays also get crowded, usual traffic jams on the way n off can be expected coz of negligent parking on the roads , but surely worth a visit , saw a few people playing in the water at one spot. Boats come with life jackets. Few restaurants onward have nice garden seating option with a view of the lake

title: poor
review: the boating out here is decent , worth trying for once , since u have come its better you do it.

title: Superb
review: Bhimtal is the biggest lake in Uttarakhand and is extremely beautiful, boat rides are available and a lot of tourists converge here, some water sports are also available here, overall a pristine and beautiful lake, must visit.

title: Ordinary lake
review: It's an ordinary lake. Nothing special about it. Boating facility is there. Traffic all around lake.

title: Big lake
review: nice time spending in the evening.  Enjoy boating and other activity at Bhimtaal.  the maggi point was great.

title: Better than other lakes nearby
review: Have visited bhimtal thrice. It is the biggest lake in the region, bigger than nainital, sattal, naukuchiatal etc. It is very less crowded as compared to nainital lake.  The lake is clean and lot of options for boating are available. Cost of boating is Rs. 250-500.  There is also a small aquarium in the middle of the lake. On the main side of the lake there are many food stalls that sell maggi, omelet, chuski, etc. There are also a couple of cheap restaurants and a small shopping complex on the lake.

title: Pretty lake
review: Tourists suck the fun out of this place !! Only activity as available is boating. Paragliding also available. Due to deforestation around, the place is now warmer than what it used to be.

title: Great for boating
review: Enjoy the time with your family in this serene lake. The boating experience is also good. offers some kids activities like zorbing.

title: Less crowded than Nainital and more enjoyable
review: If you want do boating or want to just sit by the side and enjoy the nature, it's a great place to be. It is not crowded like Nainital, even in the peak summer.

title: CLEAN !!
review: The lake is quite clean and maintained. Is a major attraction with some water sports activities and a small aquarium in middle for public.

title: beautiful lake
review: The lake is ideal for boating or even for walking around as it is not crowded. Good work has been done to maintain the cleanliness of the lake. You can walk around and find a few eateries. As Bhimtal is at a lower altitude, it can get warm in summer.

title: Big clean lake -lacks charisma
review: The lake here is cleaner anf bigger than the other nearby lakes and boating activities happen here. Near the bank of the lake lies various small food points ( street local food). However the place lacks the charisma than the Naini lake which offers a better spectacular view and is more lively. The place is comparatively warmer than Nainital as its around 20-25 KMs away. In my opinion, boating at Naukuchiatal lake is a better option.

title: Beautiful Lake and must visit on a trip to Kumaon hills
review: Beautiful and calm lake with boating and Kayak options. You will also find small tea and snacks shops near the boating point.

title: Supposedly the largest Lake out of the four available in this region
review: The lake was very beautiful. However one should always take the boat from the 'other side' i.e the road which  goes towards Naukuchiatal and not from the 'haldwani - Bhimtal highway' side as there are very few boats on this side who tend to fleece the tourists.

title: Beautiful lake... less crowded than Nainital
review: Good :

title: Good lake
review: Nice and beautiful lake but boating is 250/ that too for only 15,  mins so bit overpriced. Nothing else to do here except boating

title: One More tal
review: Bhimtal, made by Gadadhari Bheem. Beautiful lake, but not much thing to do here, as we visited this place after visit Nainital, so nothing feel special, we  did boating already, water activities already in Sattal and in Nauchiketal.

title: We did not find much new except big lake. Natural beauty was felt little better than Nainital. Paragliding was available
review: Bhimtal is small town situated around 17-18 km from Nainital. Due to hilly area, this distance easily takes 1 to 1 & half hour. We did not find something unique at this place. There is one big lake, it seems it was bigger than Naini lake. Paragliding was the thing which was unique at this place but we did not go as we found it little costly (Rs.1500 per person). If cost is not an issue, atleast for paragliding, we can visit this place. If we want to just enjoy natural beauty of hilly area, we can stay at Bhimtal. There are many hotels and resorts available.

title: Clean lake
review: Clean lake and boating here is a pleasure. Calm environment little overpriced though as they charge 450 for 30 minutes otherwise all good.

title: Bhimtal
review: Nice lake.  Weather was good and good lake for boating and nice place to see near the lake.. no other place available  for siteseen in Bhimtal

title: Bhimtal lake is most quite and pleasant place
review: Among all the lakes near Nainital, Bhimtal lake is most quite place especially towards evenings. There is less number of boats hence bit quite and less crowd as compared to other lakes. Also there are no many commercial activities and adventure games. No restaurants close to lake. Hence you can have a peaceful ride. Don't forget to pick chana jor garam before entering the boat. It is really tasty.

title: great
review: Bhimtal Lake is located near Nainital and is one of the most popular tourist destinations in Uttarakhand with amazing wheather..

title: Pleasent Experience with Clean Water resource
review: The water is very clean, one can drink water directly from the lake. The place is less crowdy as compared to Naini Lake so one can enjoy the beauty in peace. There is an aquarium in the middle of the lake. A boat ride of 30 min with cost 450. There is a certain place where water drips from the mountain and enter the lake.

title: Peaceful and calm waters
review: The view of the lake was amazing it has a serenity, the environment is calm and its a good place for natural photography

title: Nice Climate and Clear water
review: A must place visit in Bhimtal.. near , clear water and very calm lake . Also try local street food there .

title: Bhimtaal love
review: Its summer treat to beat the heat. Lake view, island, water and breeze is soothing. Enjoy street food with family and kids. Try kayaking, zorbing and boating. Evening are well spent here. The view the breeze and water will surely lify your soul.

title: Lake boating
review: Good experience, Lake maintained neat, good for photography, the surroundings also kept tidy by the authorities.

title: Just nice.
review: It is a lake that could have been so much more than just an over concretized tourist spot. Not much to see or do except for boating. The walks on the hills around it are better though.

title: Fabulous
review: The stay at hotel Lavanya will be one of the most cherished stay. The hotel staff was excellent in service above all Gaurav Joshin at front desk/ recpection provided extra care and warm welcome he also informed us about the good deal that included breakfast due to which we were able to save some money. The room were great neat clean and hygiene maintained. The front view of hotel towards lake was mesmerizing. Overall highly recommend.

title: Nice Lake !!
review: as a part of Lake Tour, been to Bhimtal but could not explore much of due to rain. The lake also has fish emporium in middle of it, Nice place to visit and if you love boating etc

title: A serene quaint scenic beauty
review: The drive around the lake is very scenic and refreshing. Boating is available in the lake but we preferred boating in Sattal lake as that was more serene and less crowded. Bhimtal is a good place to stay away from the hustle and crowd at Nainital and Bhimtal is well connected to other nearby places as well.

title: Nothing special
review: It's just a lake with scope for boating, nothing else. Unless you plan to visit Bhimtal for some other reason, don't bother to visit this, you will save some time. The boating options are much better in Nainital lake, which is considerably bigger than this.

title: Nice place and view but cleanliness is an issue
review: Nice place and view but cleanliness is an issue. Its pity to see that we have such nice places in India but people aren't ashamed to throw garbage all around, they fail to realise that they are killing their own business by doing so.

title: Calm Place
review: GOod to have boating experience. A handful of shops near the lakeside for refreshments. Depending on the climate boating is a good option.

title: Big lake with small island
review: Bhimtal Lake is a big lake with a small island in the middle of water where a aquarium established. The boating in the lake is so nice specially in evening.

title: NICE ONE
review: The lake is a small one as compared to Naukuchiatal and you can see it on your way from Kathgodam.Nice Lake but no need to stop there.

title: Good lake but view is not that good because dam has now been built
review: We visited the lake tour (Bhimtal, Sattal, Naukuchiatal, Hanuman temple) with a drop to Kathgodam to railway station on 21st Mar. We booked a cab for 1700 for this trip. It is cheaper by about 200-300 rs. as tour guides in Nainital were asking about 2000. The drivers no. is 9410515185 (Hafeez Ahmed). very good and cooperative guy.

title: Peaceful
review: Bhimtal lake is very peaceful and less crowded if compared with the nainital lake . One can really enjoy the calmness here.

title: Amazing  beauty
review: Beautiful lake. You can enjoy boating. Very less  rush comperitive Nanital. This place is bird's lover paradise. Very calm and quite  .

title: Very clean lake
review: We went for boating in the Bhimtal lake.The water is so clear and the boatman kept telling us small anecdotes .It was very nice .The beauty of the hills is awesome.Nearby is the Bhimtal  small dam also.Numerous small shops are there and one can enjoy noodles with tea coffee or cold drinks.

title: Serene lake.
review: Boating was good value for money, You must stop at the Maggi point to eat noodles and drink tea. It tasted delicious in a cold weather.

title: Beautiful lake
review: Bhimtal lake is the biggest lake among all other lake, water is clean and place to some really beautiful ducks, which you may not find nowadays in nainital. Bhimatal is comparatively less crowded, less commercial and hence a nice, peaceful location.

title: New Year trip !!!
review: One of the nine famous lakes of Nainital city. This one is bigger than the city lake but somehow I felt that it’s isolated from the city. You can find some water activities there and yes, on the way don’t miss – Paragliding. As the charges are fixed and encouraged by the government, you don’t need to worry about being cheated.

title: Big lake but spoit at the shores
review: Its becoming dirtier by the day. Its a huge lake and boating is fun but we are destroying it with filth.

title: Excellent lake
review: The lake was full of water and with a pleasant breeze blowing the boat ride was refreshing.. Only minus point is the dense growth of hotels around the place which is gradually making the place its naturality

title: Enjoy away from Nainital
review: Bhimatal make offers everything of Nainital except huge crowd. Stagnant green water with coirful boats ..fixed price boats with locals narrating history and culture give glimpses of rich culture of Kumaon region in Uttarakhand. Well connected with roads with Delhi and full of variety ranges of stays complete this location.

title: Awesome
review: Go and feel very beautiful place and you can feel nature living at there. Many places to visit near by bhimtal like Nainital . Nakuchiyatal .  and easy way to reach

title: Beautiful serene lake
review: We were passing by to go to Mukteshwar and stopped by this beautiful lake...with its serene surroundings... if you are passing by do stop and take in its beauty...

title: Absolutely Beautiful
review: Absolutely beautiful lake, almost have everything of Nainital except the Hussle. Has an island aquarium and colorful boats.

title: Wonderful
review: Nice big lake a must vist when at Bhimtal. Teh lake is quite clean, and you can go for boating. Many hotels give lake view.

title: Enjoy ment
review: Good activities  good  members of activities  are  very good  they  were  trying                best  Hemsing

title: Nice lake -- wish it was a bit cleaner...
review: Nice man-made lake in Bhimtal. However, due to the fact that the surrounding area has a lot of trash... thrash makes it to the lake as well...

title: Nice
review: Bhimtal lake is quite big and man made. It offers activities like boating, fish aquarium on an island in the lake, etc. There are many restaurants, shops around the lake where you can have food, shop.

title: Good place to visit
review: It was good to take long stride beside the lake.

title: Peaceful  and cool   Bhimtal Lake
review: We went to Bhimtal  in may ending . It was raining then. all in all atmosphere was pleasant.

title: A quite place
review: A quite place with few boats .. feeding to ducks was good and the boat man was simple nice young person

title: Peaceful place
review: Awessomme place . Very very beautiful. Just go for it. You will love the peace and the natural beauty

title: Well maintained Lake
review: This one is another good lake in Nainital District and second most attractive lake after Nainital lake.The natural beauty of this lake is unique and you have seen one island between the lake.

title: Nice n cool place
review: It is very popular and good lake. Ir is surrounded with peace, good boat facility and nice staff to attend you.

title: Nice quiet place with a cool breeze
review: Nice lake surrounded by mountains. Boating is expensive. There is an island in the middle of the lake housing a decripit aquarium. Cool breeze near the lake is the attraction. One end has a very old Shiva temple which is not well naintained though.

title: Winter Trip
review: Unlike the Nainital lake, thie place is serene, quite and away from crowds. It takes almost 23 km drive from Nainital to reach here.

title: Awsome Lake
review: Bhimtal lake is very nice. In between lake the fish Aquarium is nice. Behind the lake Temple is also good

title: A good stroll
review: We strolled by, early morning! No traffic , no selfie clicking tourists!

title: Liked it more than Nani Lake
review: It was too good booting experience in Bhimtal lake because there was no more rush and everyone was behaving too good. Boats were clean and lake was also too clean. Best part was there is a hotel in middle of the lake where you can enjoy some snacks and specially "Kadi Chawal".

title: Short detour to bhimtal
review: Beautiful fresh water lake with cold breeze!! Was travelling to haldwani for a wedding and bhimtal happened to be an impromptu detour, but, its totally worth it!!

title: Short holiday
review: JUNIPER by itself was so good that we did not feel like moving out. The need of hour was to relax, enjoy the peace and home made food

title: beautiful lake with clean water and lots of ducks..:-)
review: one of the best lakes, less crowded than the nainital lake so you can boat around in peace..the water in this lake is cleanest among all the lakes here..there is a aquarium in an island in the middle of the lake which one can visit if one has time and interest..but the best parts the ducks..they are so cute, they sorround your boat and keep quacking, one can also feed them with care..totally enjoyed the experience..

title: Nice
review: The lake was big and clean. It has few activities going around it. We did zorbing there. It's nice and serene.

title: Beautiful lake
review: The lake located on the way from Nainital to Naukuchiatal. Beautiful lake. Paragliding is available at awesome rates near Bhimtal

title: Weekend trip
review: This place has a great view with boating facility. Also have a fish aquarium in lake.surrounded by the market.

title: Quiet if not for traffic
review: This lovely lake has grown a town all around it. If it was not for the traffic horns, just driving or walking along the lake would a great way to spend time here. Try not to use machine boats to avoid polluting the lake. Naukuchiyatal and Sat tal are not so far away. Bhowali and Kainchi Dham, of Neem Karoli Baba fame are also nearby. For those wishing to avoid the over-crowded Nainital, Bhimtal and the other lakes are good alternatives.

title: Clean and well maintained
review: It's good for a morning jog or a walk around the lake.

title: Nice Lake
review: Enroute to Naukuchiataal from Nainital lies this lake. Compared to the other 2 its much smaller, nevertheless worth to have a look at. It is quite nice and there is an aquarium in the middle too. Some boating activities are also present. It is definitely worth to have a look at if you are in the surrounding area.

title: Relaxing Place To Spend The Evening
review: Bhimtal is one of the cleaner and less touristy (translate less traffic and human bodies) lakes in the region. Its the perfect place if you are seeking a relaxing evening. One can enjoy boating here, as well as some great street food available in the market. For the more adventuresome, there is paragliding and other adventure activities that our conducted in the vicinity.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: Its a very beautiful lake with very good view of natural beauties. You can have a boating and views of birds also.

title: Quite and beautiful
review: One of the better lakes in Nainital district, Bhimtal lake is a good place to enjoy nature amidst quite and peaceful surroundings as compared to the rather commercial Nainital lake. A must visit while in the area is the lovely iHeart Cafe Himalayas :)

title: A Pretty picture
review: This is one of the more popular tourist destinations for a weekend break. Ideal when one wants to avoid the very crowded Nainital, especially in tourist season.

title: Its a Lake...
review: It is a Lake, so all you can do is laze around and go for boating... The boat club, overcharges you like crazy but if you have to do boating, you don't have a choice...

title: Tranquil,Serene and A must Visit Place!
review: I have found that Bhimtal is much calmer and serene in comparison to Nainital as not much people frequent this place.Must Visit!

title: Beautiful lake !!
review: It is a large beautiful lake relatively clean, Surrounded by mountains. Boating facility is available, which will provide you best views from all corners of lake. I recommend to visit this lake.

title: A good walk around
review: The lake is huge and it can't be circumferences with a vehicle by walk it is possible . Unlike other lakes it is not very commercial

title: Mesmerising hill station & lake
review: Bhimtal lake is good, you can surf here, from the kanthgodam station bhimtal is near about 21 km. Its is one of the best lake in Uttarakhand.

title: Clean Lake
review: Island in between add value to it. The boating in this triangle shaped lake gives an excellent experience.

title: Bhimtal
review: Nice lake with clear water and perfect scenery. Enjoyed boating and some of good restaurants enjoyed food at Lake view restaurant just by the side of Lake. The food was delicious and comparatively economical.

title: Lots of potential but not well organized
review: The lake itself presents a lot of potential but the ill organized traffic and activities takes lot of the fun out of your vacation. A bit more effort to organize the parking and activities in the lake will go a long way.

title: Over crowded and no charm
review: What I linked:

title: big and calm
review: Lake in bhimtal is big and calm. activities can be done are boating and some adventurous. but there is nothing much to do in Bhimtal.

title: Nothing much activities just enjoy nature
review: Bhimtal lake is bigger then naukchital and has some boating bt dodn;t expect any more activities. You can visit area while visiting naukchitaal lake.

title: Good experience
review: You can do boating here and enjoy the scenic beauty of Bhimtal. Also there is one temple situated on an island, in the middle of the lake, which can be reached by boat.

title: Sitting in the laps of nature
review: The Bhimtal Lake is a must-visit place in Bhimtal (duh!). The boating was nice here, the view with the lake and the mountains in the background was something straight out of a movie. I loved the view and it was nice knowing the origins of the lake from the boating guy.

title: Nice Lake
review: This is a good place to spend some time away from the busy city life.. Cool and vast Lake.. Enjoy boating across. The view is wonderful. Anyday Better than naini Lake in nainital.

title: Had a great time in chilling breeze and cloud all around
review: Really a great place to visit after Nanital , even u can enjoy the Paragliding ,boating experience, almost covering the mountains u go straight down to the valley lovely...

title: beautiful lake but poor infrastructure
review: The approach to the lake was unclean. The boats were also not in top of the shape and the life jackets were dirty and smelly. The view of the lake is nice though.

title: Excelent
review: There is not much crowded comparing to the nainetal lake and you can enjoy the place and also the boating.

title: Bhimtal visit
review: Cool and very calm place, much better than Nainital. Not a very happening one but if u want to pass your holidays at a quiet place Bhimtal is one

title: Just loved it!
review: On our 3 days stay at Mukteshway, we visited this place everyday. It is so less crowded and commercialized than the Naini lake. If you want a quiet place and relaxed visit, go to the corner which does not offer boating. If you want to shop, eat and boat then go at another entry point where boats are.. So it suits all. We went to both entries- the quiet one and the boating point. Both offered different and delightful experience. You can shop for kids. Try golgappas there - awesome! This place offers zorbing too - a funny experience for us. Overall a memorable exp - if i could, i would love to go there again and would try both entry points once again.

title: A very beautiful place to spend he evenings with family and kids
review: We were there last week with kids. Its an awesome place, well maintained and good for kids as they love the boating and zorping ball. Also lots of street food avilable there to savour. The boat ride itself will cost 260 for a couple and 2 kids or 3 adults. Go after sunset or in cool weather to fully enjoy.

title: Passing by
review: A lovely lake with poplars and maples lining the lake side. The lake is clean and clear and no affluence from the surrounding buildings get into the lake.

title: Clean & neat
review: It's a very big lake especially neat & clean.

title: Calm and beautiful
review: The lake is clean, calm. You can enjoy hot bhuttas and roam around the lake. There is an aquarium at the center of the lake which can be seen and kids love it. The lake has a fish breeding place and you can spot lots of fishes while walking around.

title: Family trip
review: Overall experience in this hotel was excellent, we enjoyed a lot.. Service was very prompt and staff were so cooperative.. They have provided everything as they mentioned in the mail. I must say... Complete value for money. Responder rate on mail need to improve.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: The lake is located near Nainital and the scenery is very awesome. Food facilities are also easily available and lake is surrounded by mountains, so it adds to the beauty.

title: Beautiful
review: Boating was great. The lake water  does not have any stink. Aquarium could have been better. Try not to go boating when you see an approaching cloud.

title: Good well maintained
review: It's a beautiful 250 feet deep lake...less crowded and commercial than Nainital...less food options..the boating system is good..the life gear they give is neat and clean...we had food at variety that is just near the police station round about...good Chinese food...other hotels refused Chinese cuisine ..overall good...but not great ...

title: Beautiful place with excellent view and atmosphere
review: Visited bhimtal lake on 23rd may17 along with family. Very scenic place and a must go.In the middle of lake there is a aquarium which is very good especially for kids.Boating options are also there for full lake or for going to aquarium. A very good Temple of shivji is also situated close to lake.

title: Quiet lake
review: Unlike Nainital, this lake is very peaceful. You could see very limited public hustle bustle here. There is an aquarium in the middle of the lake.

title: Boating, kayaking, Zorbing and food shacks
review: Must visit while in Bhimtal.

title: Less crowed, close to nature, better than nanital for nature lover
review: while going to nanital, i mistakenly booked my hotel in bhimtal, but it appears to me very good. Boating in bhimtal lake is far better than nanital. You can also enjoy paragliding here. There is only bhimtal lake to visit over here but you will really enjoy it. It is a 1 hour journey from nanital.

title: A beautiful lake!
review: A much better lake than Naini lake for sure. Less crowded, clean water, all the facilities as is with Naini lake. I stayed for a night in Hotel lake inn. Major issues with the bhimtal lake area is :

title: Bhimtal
review: If you want to avoid the rush of Nainital but want to have similar experience, this is the place to be. Boating can be enjoyed in Bhimtal lake. You can also enjoy various outdoor activities like paragliding, rappelling, flying fox...

title: Peaceful Lake
review: The lake is not as crowded as Nainital, but equally beautiful. The lake boat ride is great. There is a aquarium in the middle of the lake. Lots of water activities for kids like scooter ride, Zorbing (Water Balloon) etc.

title: Largest lake and less crowd
review: Activities that can be performed in the lake is Boating, Kayaking and Zorbing. Missing paddle boating in Bhimtal lake. Fish aquarium in the small island. Elderly/ religious person can visit nearby temple. Activities start at around 11.00 and run until 6.00 PM in summers.

title: Nice place
review: It's nice to visit bhimtal.You can enjoy boating there and kids can enjoy swings.In center of bhimtal there is a aquarium , lot of fishes of different breeds you can see.sometime it is close because of maintenance.

title: Paradise
review: A beautiful place, ideal for morning and evening walk. Close by from throwback villa, it offers Serene view of the small hilly town.

title: boating
review: lake is very beautiful. Near lake , there is a temple of Lord shiva... which is basically the main point of bhimtal.

title: Calm Lake
review: This place comes on road if you are driving from kathgodam to nainital, 22 km before nainital. Lake is beautiful, however there is nothing so special except you are interested in boating. However i would suggest to do boating at sattal lake. which is more calm and peaceful. The aquarium is in the middle which you can take a ride in boat. It has some entry fee, but there is nothing special about the aquarium as such.

title: Nice
review: Great lake in Bhimtal #nainital#sattal

title: Beautiful
review: Very beautiful lake. Above the mountain nice view. We can see the gateway of kumaun hills ( Haldwani) from the top. A little island in center of lake. Very good weather. Many beautiful lakes nearby places. Totally relaxing and enjoying place.

title: Calm, Clean and Beautiful Lake!
review: We visited Bhimtal Lake in May 2017 with family.

title: Bhimtal review
review: Bhimtal lake boat ride is great, you have kids activity also there which you can enjoy and also if you are adventure frek you can try hunting fish with locals as its the only lake where fishing is legalise and you cant do the same in other lake

title: Huge Lake with lot of activities
review: If you like lakes which offer something for everyone then this is the place to be. There are activities for young n adults alike - boating, zorbing, paragliding, kayaking...must visit !

title: Buzzing yet clean
review: Bhimtal lake is buzzing with activity.Yet, surprisingly its clean and boating here in fulfilling as well as entertaining

title: Nice, peaceful and calm
review: Very nice peaceful and calm lake. Not so crowded like the Nainital but yet beautiful. There is a aquarium at the middle of the lake.

title: Bhimtal lake
review: Bhimtal is a quiet, serene place away from the hustle and bustle of the city. The Bhimtal lake is the centre of Bhimtal and life is centred around it. A cool lovely breeze emanates from the lake. Boating is there for tourists though it is very expensive Rs 360/- for half around of the lake. The water is deep and dark . Boatmen say it abides in fish and snakes in water also so it is best not to dip your hand in the waters.There is a dam near the Bhimeshwar temple but the gates are unused and full of trash.A flock of ducks can be seen paddling in the lake. The lake is nice and cool.Overall the place is great for a break.

title: Good lake, but not frequented by many....
review: Cool and calm lake but not as many travellers as they frequent Naini lake... Boating available too...

title: Was a nice experience
review: Less crowded than nainital but little hot compared to nainital boating and aquarium visit was good we enjoyed, didn't try Para gliding

title: Lake in the lake city Nainital
review: Bhimtal is a tourist place which is around 35 km before you reach Nainital. The Tal ( lake ) in Bhimtal is situated at a lower altitude and is clean and very peaceful place. If you visit Bhimtal , you must visit this place for a quite boat ride and some local gol gappes around this place.

title: from the road its a Panoramic View of Bhimtal Lake - Aquarium is excellent
review: from the road Bhimtal Lake View is Panoramic and Aquarium is excellent. you must visit with children and they will love it.

title: Lovely like amidst of nature
review: It is lovely and clean lake surrounded mountains and scenic setting.  Boating facilities are available.  Small town and since water is source of drinking it is very cleanly maintained.  Bhim Mahadev temple can be visited near the lake.

title: Fun filled place
review: Lake is huge.Boating experience in lake is fabulous. Fish Aquarium located mid of lake is very nice. Children like it very much. Food stalls near lake provide mouth-watering dishes.

title: kayaking
review: go for kayaking at this place, if you are a quiet liking person like us, go at the morning time. evenings get too crowded. the lake is amazing and the weather lovely. cool activities for kids too.

title: Very clean.largecalm,  lake with lesser crowding
review: The lake is larger, cleaner and less crowded. One can enjoy long stints of boating  in breath taking surroundings and clean air. There are ducks and duckling for company and boatsmen are very co operative. Avoid going to aquarium in center of lake.  waste of time and money.

title: May,20
review: Nice place awsome place,good hospitality,and nice staff,food was awsome, and the nice dogs are so cute,security, is nice,and Privacy

title: serene quiet place
review: ok for 2 days 1 night stay, no much activities around except boating and paragliding. Do visit a Government emporium which sells textiles made of jute fabric, sugarcane fabric, banana fabric, pashmina razai etc.

title: Beautiful Lake amidst nature
review: Its a very beautiful lake. You can go for boating or can just relax sitting near by. There are few food vendors to have some light food and small shops to do some shopping. There is one aquarium in the middle of the lake which is worth visiting.

title: Beautiful scenic view
review: A place you can take a walk in the evening. Nothing so special about it. Just a scenic view. Boat rides are 250INR per person. You have a small aquarium island in the middle.If you are interested in paragliding- the prices vary from 800-1500INR per person. We were 4 people and after bargaining we cut a deal at 800 INR per person.

title: Huge lake
review: Bhimtal is a huge lake but is not very well maintained. Plastic wrappers and weeds are present on the shores, which makes it less appealing. Boating and water sports facilities are available here. Few restaurants are present nearby to satisfy hunger.

title: Nice
review: Awesome place. Really nice to be there. After so much of typical hill stations like Shimla Kullu Manali Mussoorie etc Bhimtal is such a nice place to be. Do visit it guys. You shall enjoy

title: Lake with Aquarium in the middle
review: One of the famous four Lake destinations in Uttarakhand, this is probably the most dense and commercialized place. It has a large area of habitat surrounded by scenic mountains. Boating is offered besides a visit to the Aquarium in the middle of the lake. A lot of shops and fast food kiosks to taste some local food just outside the lake. Overall, worth a visit once while you are near Nainital or Nauchikiyatal.

title: A lake so beautiful
review: I'm a regular visitor of this place because i have a cottage here. it's a small and picturesque lake town which is named after the famous temple Bhimeshwar situated on the eastern bank of the lake. Bhimtal is popular among tourist and local travellers alike due to its proximity to the famous hill station Nainital. Bhimtal is is known for its enormous lake (tal). activities like boating, fishing, horse riding on the lake side are main attractions for the tourist. food stalls are added attraction along side the lake. the lake bhimtal has an island on the centre can be visited by boat. the place has religious significance as well. the Bhimeswar temple is always a place of attraction to the pilgrims from far and near round the year. It's a must visit tourist place.   Ashit Kumar Das.

title: Clean Lake
review: to me it is better than nainital lake and even the boating is economic. Attraction of Island Aquarium enhance the beauty of Lake.

title: Wonderful View and fun boating
review: Stable water with cold wind blowing makes you feel relaxed and nice.

title: Very nice place to visit
review: It is one the famous place of uttrakhand and it a nice place to be. there is small aquarium island in the middle of the lake. Not much activities around except boating and paragliding

title: Beautiful Lakeview
review: Beautiful lake. Natural scenery. Not as crowded as Nainital or Naina lake. I am not sure how safe the boating is, as there were very few people on the lake. Good for enjoying as a picnic spot for a few minutes.

title: Time Pass Spot
review: Nothing special here except from boating, as this is possible in all lakes.

title: decent lakeview
review: Decent lake, no boating activities. Only a fish aquarium is there in middle of the lake. the most exciting part is to go on a walk on cycle ride along the lake.

title: Quite nice place for couples
review: It is a peaceful tourist place, ideal visit for  couples, boating in a crowd free lake, a quality time can be spend there.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: Bhimtal Lake is huge.

title: Another Hangout point near Delhi
review: If you want to get rid of from Delhi's hustle and bustle then this place is heaven for you. We enjoyed a lot in this trip and covered all the Taals.

title: Very peaceful and beautiful lake!
review: The place is very peaceful. You can clearly hear the chirping of birds and indulge yourself in nature.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: We went for boating on the lake.They took us to the museum and then dropped back near our hotel.Wonderful experience!

title: Beautiful Lake ,Peaceful surroundings
review: This is among the beautiful lakes in Nainital.

title: Calm and serene
review: Calm and serene lake. Excellent for boating and canoeing. The lake is lined by few eateries and gift shops while the main market is at a slight walking distance

title: Good one
review: if you are in Nainital then you can visit this bhimtal lake, beautiful and peaceful lake with  an aquarium in the middle of lake. You can take a leisurely stroll around the lake and can also feed the ducks.This place has lots of eateries and tea stalls.

title: Lake with Aquarium in the middle
review: The lake is beautiful and very significant landmark in bhimtal. The aquarium is in the middle which you can take a ride in boat. it has some entry fee, but there is nothing special about the aquarium as such.

title: beautiful Lake
review: One of beautiful lake in city of Lakes but lake of maintenance as compare to Nainital lake though it is one of biggest lake,one can enjoy ans spend lot of time on lake n in the lap of Nature

title: Serenity in a quaint town
review: Just a lovely place to visit and spend days if you are not an adrenaline junkie... and if you are - go paragliding or jog around the lake. Such a safe feel to the whole place plus, good old simplicity.

title: Pretty scenery
review: It was our first trip to the lake towns of Nainital and Bhimtal. The view of the lake quite pleasing. One can choose to do boating too. There is an aquarium in the middle of the lake that you can visit, not very impressive though. The chaat valas at the side of the lake are fun to spend time and money on. get your share of Rajma chawal, Kadhi Chawal, Juice, Chai, Momos etc.

title: Largest lake in the region
review: Boating is available, there is an aquarium in the middle of the lake.

title: Nice Clean Lake
review: Nice Clean Lake and you cant sit hours viewing and feeling the calmness, silence and touch of Nature, Great place to be in.

title: A Peaceful And Quite Tourist Destination
review: Bhimtal is a  lake metropolis named after Bhima the charismatic mythological person of Mahabharata respected for its aesthetic splendor, Bhimtal proudly sits at an altitude approximately 1365 above sea stage. in assessment to Nainital this is always bustling with interest and crowd Bhimtal is extra of an idyllic  area that's much less crowded. Bhimtal is a peaceful  and pretty location which adds charm to the stay at right here and provide sufficient water game possibilities for amateurs with paddling and boating centers. Bhimtal cowl larger place than Nainital.

title: Average spot for time pass
review: Average spot for time pass, No Boating or any other activities. A small temple to visit in the one side of lake. Lots of Hotels are are around lake. Nanital lake is the best option to visit if you want to do boating.....

title: Calm Place
review: I found less crowd in Bhimtal lake as compared to Nainital Lake. There is a small island in the center of this lake which can be visited by any boat. The prices of the boating is fixed there and displayed at various places.

title: good exp...
review: Bhimtal (भीमताल) is a town and a nagar panchayat in Nainital district in the state of Uttarakhand, India, situated at an altitude of 1370 meters above sea level and is about 22 kilometers from Nainital. The major attraction in Bhimtal is the Bhimtal Lake, which has an island at its centre. Besides tourism, Bhimtal has also now become a mini district headquarters since most of the district administration offices have been shifted to the newly constructed Vikas Bhawan, the building complex for district administrative offices.

title: Scenic beauty
review: Very beautiful lake , surrounded by mountains.lush green trees , soothing breeze and real sound of nature

title: The quiet maid
review: My impression about the lake has been of a quiet maid who appears to go on undemanding and despite its size, goes unnoticed. The only treatment tourist offer it is getting down for quick selfie moments and then push off. Despite the legend which surrounds according to which lake was created by Bhim's mace. It doesn't gets its due respect. I am just awed by its magnificent views, unhurried character and the small town which lays by its side.

title: Beautiful
review: When you see it for the first time, you will think that the temples and other structures are floating on the water. It is very beautiful. The best time to be here is the evening.

title: Bhimtal  Lake
review: one of the best lake after visiting nainital lake just 22 km away from main nainital city and 2 km from sattal and 8 km from naukuchital lake ... view and boating is awesome

title: Bhimtal Lake Boating
review: We had taken 2 boats (6 of us) for a ride for 1 hour each. Have had a pleasant lake ride. The Boat-Guy has shown us all famous spots within 1 hour. He was not only rowing the boat, he was our lifeguard as well as guide. He took us to the centre of the lake where there was a small dilapidated building. A board displayed there indicated that it was an aquarium. Our Boat-Guy asked us whether we wanted to go in there. As the external condition of the aquarium was not very inviting, we preferred to enjoy the scenic beauty surrounding the lake in that limited time available to us.

title: Pretty
review: This was a stop over enroute to binsar. Nice clean lake where you could boat and had some hawkers around. Good to take a walk and feed the ducks. However, not much to do nearby, We did paragliding a few kms away from the lake which was good even with the minimalist set up. . Didn't find any signs of zorbing though as advertised on a few websites.

title: Early morning walk
review: Went to the temple  by the lake, when the sun was shining high above tolerating the chill wind, enjoying the view and had lovely parantha.

title: The boating is good
review: Walk around the lake in the morning or in the night, not very late. The nature is refreshing and there is no crowding in the area

title: Peaceful place
review: Aquarium at the mid of the lake....with some  activities like kayaking, boating, zorbing and paragliding...

title: Nice
review: It is good for a walk. We enjoyed the tea, momos and maggi. a small shop by the name of Stop & Shop was also good timepass....reasonably priced

title: Serene
review: As compared to the Naini Lake in Nainital, this lake is less crowded and you can spend peaceful time here. Boating and eating options are also there.

title: Wonderful small lake surrounded from the Kumaon mountains
review: Very nice place closed to Haldwani and not so crowded like Nainital Lake. Nice area around and my hotel was superb

title: Lake view and photography
review: I visited this place in 1st week of November. Found the place to be absolutely heaven for photography with lake view in the background. It's an ideal place for people with both point n shoot or dslr camera in hand to capture the blue/green lake view. So all the selfie lovers, get ready to click some beautiful pics of yourself with your loved one. If you are in the mood to try your hands on your camera, then you rightly belong to this place which is paradise for all instagram lovers.

title: A beautiful lake in the Himalayan foothills, minus the crowd of Nainital
review: The lake is quite large. The water is clean. There are a couple of ghats. The main ghat faces a tiny island, which houses a display of aquariums containing different types of small fishes. Boating facilities are available: They take 4 persons on a boat ride of 20-30 minutes around the lake for 200 rupees. There are many secluded areas along the banks: it's just nice to get away from all the hustle-bustle and enjoy the serene atmosphere. Sunset casts a beautiful reddish yellow glow over the sky and the lake.

title: Nice boat ride
review: The largest lake around the Nainital region. Not too crowded but nice to have a boat ride. Water is not too clean but better than some other lakes around. Serene and calm. Has an aquarium which can only be reached via a boat.

title: Ramembering Bhima
review: Bhimtal is one among the nine lakes of Nainital. During the vanavasa of Pandavas Bhima is known to have visited Bhimtal. The lake with dam and island in the middle is the main attraction. Bhimeswara temple on the lakeside is visited by lot of worshippers of Lord Siva. Boating and canoeing is for tourists. Lot of hotels and lodging houses on either side of the lake.  A place to be not missed,  just 22 km from Nainital.

title: Good View
review: You get a good view and relaxation during the boat ride at Bhimtal. I could rate it as one of the above average experience

title: anniversary
review: very well maintained nd friendly environment..will visit soon here.neat nd clean rooms.swimming pool is under construction..hope in our next visit we will enjoy pool..i will rate 5***** to this resort.

title: Good scenery
review: A good place to visit. Couldn't find much places to eat around so ate rajma chawal... which was good enough. Short visit but a good one.

title: Beautiful,not as crowded  as nainital
review: Clean,quiet,good boating.nice way to pass time.safe because life jacket is a must.cheap small good chat at lake

title: Serene Place!
review: I went to bhimtal on a road trip. Had an amazing stay at one of the hotel - The Hammock Bhimtal. We went to visit bhimtal lake. It was an amazing experience. We were so close to nature. Felt so good.

title: great place for walks boating fishing
review: great place for walks boating fishing. the lake is deep so be careful. the place around the lake especially the restricted for cars . i.e.pedestrian side is great for strolls. winters are comfortable too. lined with great Small stores for daily things now small bites. you can also buy fish near the lake if you have not had a catch.

title: Nice lake with a peaceful environment for a relaxing holiday
review: This lake is beautiful and peaceful as well. If you compare this with Nainital lake, although the naini lake is more beautiful and scenic but you will see a lot of rush at nainital everywhere whereas you will have less tourists here which will make your visit more enjoyable.

title: Good for a short visit or a Stop over
review: It is good for a short visit and is less crowded than Naini lake. Nice stopover to munch on few snacks while enjoying scenic beauty.

title: Overpriced
review: Boating, zorbing, food, snacks...everything is too overpriced here. Though the lake is clean and well maintained, but nothing justifies this price.

title: Serene Silent Abode  For Interact with your Innerself
review: Reached after Day long Hectic Dusty Drive On Potholes all the way, Off-course one of the best Location of Bhimtal,giving Birds Eye View . Night's Calm during Off Season was perhaps the Most Charming & Satisfying for any one looking for ? Soothing Cool Weather , Glittering Lights in Clear water of Bhimtal was real attainment of Visit. Bhimtal being well connected, sleepy town  with thin population during off season is unique feature to be there. All 11- 12 rooms are facing to lake , top floor give clearer view ,with room with large glass window idea is too good . Hospitality services were average but affordable, staff was not fully trained may be off season arrangement. Those looking party galore may re-think but overall best location, good prices are the key features of Lake.

title: Lovely clean lake
review: Although not well known , Bhimtal Lake is a must see if one is visiting in and around Nainital or Almora. It is not so crowded area with lots to see and enjoy. The lake itself is clean and large. One can do boating. Beautiful views.

title: Nice place.
review: You can have a visit once if you are near by nainital. Doesn't worth visiting specifically if you are not local.

title: Eye stopping
review: It is the main attraction of the bhimtal. Take a boat and just get lost in the beautiful scenic view. Do visit the temple Bheemeshwar.  The chanting of shlokas and bhajans add spiritually to the environment.

title: peacefull
review: good expreiance, rate of boat hire can be negotiate, they people try to over charge. aquarium in middle of lake is quite good, must see.

title: Nice View
review: Bhimtal lake no doubt better then Nainital lake and area is more wide even you have option for adventure spots.

title: Better than Nainital
review: Quaint and nice place, much better than the more famous Nainital. I would like to recommend it to everyone. Good for kids and adults.

title: Better than Nainital, less commercialised
review: This is 40 minutes before Nainital and is more serene, quite and beautiful than Nainital. I say so because I have been coming here since many years almost every year. The boat ride, horse ride, food and stay is all cheaper. It has a very beautiful aquarium, which built on a small island in the lake. It's an old aquarium but houses some of the most beautiful fishes. Approximately 4 kms from here is another taal (lake) called Naukuchiyataal, which is another feast for your eyes. Naukuchiyataal Sector also has some good tracks for trekking and Paragliding activities.

title: Nice place to visit
review: Wooooooow

title: awesome lake
review: not crowdy and very beautiful lake. easy approachable and fine boating. recommended place for every nature lover

title: A majestic lake
review: A majestic lake half the time covered with fog; with good view points; but there is a lot of traffic in the town

title: Great place
review: Another nice lake in nainital surrounding. Enjoy the boating in the lake. Although not much to see around except adventure sports in the area.

title: Calm & Serene Bhimtal lake
review: This is becoming a sought after weekend getaway for working youth in capital of India and neighboring cities. It is 5 hours drive away from Delhi and it's best to start early morning. Contrary to Nainital this place is not very commercialized and one can observe people living their daily lives in the mountains. This lake has a long periphery and one can walk around with cool breeze rushing through one's hair. This place is perfect if you are looking for a peaceful getaway from crowded population. If you do not want to drive up to Bhimtal then one can book an airconditioned bus from Delhi and take a shared car from Kothagodam bus stop. Google map works fine for navigation.

title: about it
review: This is a very oridnary lake featured for only some water activities such as kaayaki boatingzip lining etc

title: Gud old lake , you can go for boating
review: You can go for boating if you have time but if you done boating on nanital lake then it is not required at all

title: Beautiful Lake!!
review: Bhimtal is about 22 kilometers from Nainital. But it is way peaceful that Naini Lake. You can have some boating activities there or you could just sit next to it and enjoy its beauty.

title: Good
review: Not much shops restraus around the lake but still beautiful peaceful lake with boating facility.have a awesome weather and fish aquarium in middle of lake

title: super weather and lake
review: very romantic place for couple and family wiyh a beautiful lake....there are so activity to enjoy.........

title: Decent place to visit with family
review: Nice place. Lot of options. Good food around. Very good picnic spot to go with family on a nice sunny day in winters.

title: Peaceful
review: Bhimtal is an hour car ride from Nainital. It's a beautiful huge lake but surprisingly devoid of noisy tourists. It's 150 ft deep at places and clean. There is an aquarium on a tiny island where you have to take a boat. The boatwala will give you a ride across the lake too and charges INR 230 above the aquarium entry fees. There are water zorbing facilities available but didn't seem alluring.

title: Beautiful clean water
review: Bhimtal like is one of the most beautiful lakes I have ever see in India. The water is clean and there is an awesome boating experience at this place. We stayed at Club Mahindra Naukuchiatal and we passed by this lake going to and fro. I was totally amazed to find such a well maintained and beautiful lake. There is an aquarium in the middle of the lake which can be visited by a boat ride. Awesome place to be.

title: Pleasant in the evening
review: Bhimtal lake area is quite crowded ,but in the evening it is pleasant for boating. The Bhimeshwar temple at the lake is worth a Darshan .

title: Awesome scenic view with calm lake water
review: Loved the kayaking and boating at the lake.

title: beauty
review: its a beauty, i personaly feel this lake is better than nainital lake.even we could enjoy rowing here,that was a 1st kind of experience for us.

title: beautiful lake
review: this is the biggest lake in nanital. it was one of the refreshing experience. it is decent place to visit with the family.

title: Beautyful Lake
review: this lack is very beautiful and big this place is fun for boating in water and very beautful creation of nature

title: Good Lake view
review: View of lake is good but required maintenance and upkeep. Some water activities are interesting. Walking along the lake in awesome epically in morning and evening hrs.

title: Clean lake at that time among all lakes
review: The lake was very clean and quite big. Lot of ducks in and around the lake gives you good feel. The boating area was not crowded like nainital..you also get to cross a small bride to go to other side of on was you have small mandir.on the other side you have typical village town with some good restaurants and tea stall. Tips.. walk from your lake side hotel in the morning and have a sip of tea sitting by the lake..

title: Boating
review: I had a chance to visit Bhimtal lake and was a very good experience, nothing much to do other than boating ,but the climate and scenerioes were really very good

title: good view from the far
review: While going to Ranikhet we took a turn to Bhimtal to have a look. The lake is big and looks good. But it is very crowded and at some corners not clean.

title: Lake View
review: Awesome view to find this specular place.....nice view and beautiful lake with temple and small market

title: Good place, offers Nainital like experience without Nainital like crowd!!!
review: Loved the experience of boating in vast Lake surrounded by Hills. Beautiful sunset just added to the experience.

title: Weekend
review: Long walks, sky diving, boating, long chats with locals and listening to folk songs sung by the delightful young children of local housekeeping staff. Perfect holiday.

title: gorgeous and peaceful
review: Very calm lake ... good part its not crowded. You can sit by side or do boating ... time is yours and you would love it!

title: decent place
review: the lake was bang opp to my hotel so had amazing view frm hotel itself and roaming around the lake is also good... the cleanliness is very good ... u will have great time in this lake .... there are many activities over there to go around...

title: The best lake of uttarakhand
review: This lake is even better than the nainital lake as it looks more peaceful and more calming and possess all the characteristic of being surrounded by picturesque mountains all around.. certain water activity are available additionally to boat ride , at this site like water scooter ride , water balloon , steamer rides, etc which are not available at nainital lakes.. the lakes view is very scenic and pleasurable

title: Just beautiful
review: I just love the lake..mostly when we start our walk from lake side. Its amazing for boating peace lake.

title: Clear water, good options
review: The water looked transparent and better than what we saw at Naini lake. Options that existed at the lake was great, enjoyed zorbing, rowing boats.

title: Must Visit...for Aquarium and boating
review: The place is around 20 km from Nainital. The lake is good to visit. Though covered boats (Shikara) is not available you can enjoy boating may be before 10 and after 5 pm here during sunny days. There is a small aquarium with a entry ticket of Rs 60 on the island in lake. Its a small island and close from the land but the hiring a boat is must. They charge Rs 120 to and from aquarium, which is a good deal rather than pleasurably boating here. For boating pleasure the main Nainital lake is good. Other than this Navkuchiya Tal and Sat Tal is preferable due to the availability of Shikara here which you can enjoy even when sun shines bright.

title: Bhimtal lake June 2016
review: Amazing place to spend your time in absolute peace. No commercialization around this lake. Walk around this lake during rains is picturesque........................

title: Lake visit....fun-filled.....
review: Bhimtal Lake is one of the chosen tourist spots where the tourists really have great fun specially boating.  It is a place where the entertainment is just Great for children.There are various types of lake entertainment.

title: Awesom place
review: Awesome property wid gud staff....i enjoyed lot.....dynamic location .....very big room wid gud facility ....gud food served by staaf .....

title: Exotic boating experience
review: We stayed in bhimtal for this summer, as we stayed for 3 days we got little for day outing. So this place was on our 2 visit list apart from the aquarium (waste of time). When we visited during that some little rain also was there so it was a very pleasant ride. That old man who was riding the boat also so nice he was talking about his experience.

title: Lake lake
review: This is a big lake and part of which is man made. Boating is normal activity and cost around 200 bucks for 4 person. You can see the ducks and duckings around the lake. Btw did i mention that swimming is allowed in this lake. Water is very clean and this is the same water which full of bhimtal gets for daily needs so dont make it dirty by throwing stuff etc.all in all nice plave

title: One of many "Tals" in Naini Tal District
review: A serene place, we happen to be here on a rainy day. So could't walk much though. The attraction of the lake happens to be the view the mountains from one side and the self-rowing boats taking a max of 4 passengers at a time. A nice walk on a cool evening will certainly leave you energised and relaxed at the same time

title: Worst Experience
review: No single piece of good attraction here. All is waste... Too humid, crowdy and polluted.. Bhimtal itself looks very boring..

title: Serene !!
review: Serene ,less croweded and clean .

title: Far from the maddening crowd
review: In my school days, I used to frequent Nainital a lot. A quiet lake, sail boating, horse riding, it had all the answers to the question.. Where is a fun place to go this summer.

title: Great clean lake
review: Good lake for boating and lazing around the lake. It has many shops around the side. It has great views of the mountains.

title: amazing lake
review: enjoy boating in lake , nice aquarium in the center of lake .good local market near lake , small eatery's near the lake  .

title: Serene
review: This is the biggest of the lakes in the Nainital region. Very clean and well maintained lake. You can do boating and canoeing in this lake.

title: Bhimtal
review: Awesome lake with very clean surrounding. Very peaceful location. You can drive to nainital in 1 HR from bhimtal to check naini lake and mall road.

title: Better than Naini lake
review: Visited Kumaon with family in last week of June.

title: Very Good View
review: Overall very good experience. Good view but I liked Sattal Lake more than Bhimtal because of natural surroundings. Otherwise both laks have similar activities to good.

title: Nice view of lake
review: The lake is big & worth a visit, however the location is pretty crowded with commercial stuff making it reduce the nature aspect. There should be bigger and safer boat options rather than the small boats. The boat fare is also over-priced.

title: The local bag shop was a hit!
review: We spent an hour wandering around the shops on the lake shore. One of our group members thought the bag shop was excellent value and bought loads for gifts.

title: the largest lake in the lake district, less crowded ,more    tranquil than Naini lake
review: Bhimtal lake,  is the largest lake in the  lake district of Kumaon , the waters being impounded  with a masonry dam  and having forest coverage on one side.   It   is  about 22 kilometers away from  Nainital and larger than Naini  lake but less crowded  and more peaceful. But due to commercialization, more activities are taking place , such as kayaking, zorbing resulting in  Bhimtal getting crowded.  There is a small island in the center of the lake, which  could be reached by boating. The island has an aquarium  where the kids  have fun.Various types of fish  are bred in the lake waters. But the quality of lake waters is  said to  be deteriorating  due to the number of resorts that are coming up on one side of the lake.

title: clean but not well managed
review: the lake is clean, however not very well managed, please be ready to bargain and negotiate. i would advice to go 2 kms above to naukuchiatal, there is a lovely paragliding spot. they charge flat 1500 per person and its worth it

title: A gift of nature.
review: Very nice lake in the lap of mountains. Nice surroundings. Good views. Nature at its best. Greenery attractive.

title: great lake with things to do!
review: Nice lake! has boating and kayaking. has a lot of lake facing lodges and resorts. definitely a must visit!

title: Bhimtal lake is good but not great, Why ?
review: it was nice to visit bhimtal lake.

title: Beautiful and peace
review: It's nice to visit here. A lovely space and peaceful area. Families who do Not like crowded Hotel and gr8 noise must come and stay here.

title: Excellent
review: This is as great a lake as Nainital, with far less crowds. Also, there are no stupid adventures, so keeps the crazy crowds away. Very peaceful and clean.

title: great location , badly maintained
review: very badly maintained , , lot of dirt  . such good place need good maintainance . boating is good . over all an average place

title: Well maintained Lake with less crowd!!
review: The lake is properly maintained. We were not able to find any rubbish been thrown in the the lake , which has made this lake very nice. Boating is available on two points at the lake , which provide you option of exploring this wonderful lake . There is small aquarium right in the middle of the lake on a small island. The aquarium is not that great but provide a different experience . There are number of food outlets on the bank of the lake which provide you the option with fast food .

title: Peaceful
review: Good thing about Bhimtal is that it is very peaceful and not crowded at all. Boating and kayaking is available.

title: Not very big lake
review: Be careful while boating.there is a  Small island in middle of lake with aquarium. Can sit by lakeside to enjoy nature.

title: Better to be here than Nainital for boating!!!
review: A nice experience for boating if u want to avoid too much commercialized Naini Lake. This lake also has a FISH AQUARIUM in the middle, which is a treat for children.It is a well maintained aquarium. My 3 years old just loved it!!!!

title: peaceful place
review: The best part about this place is that it was not crowded and was peaceful..the weather was pleasant .. Bloating was a good experience as no crowd was there ..you can do activities such as trekking, fishing etc...

title: Good lake
review: If the weather is pleasant then boating on the lake is a great experience. Lake is huge. Probably bigger than Naini lake.

title: No Maintenance
review: A tourist place without any maintenance. Govt is not taking any care. The water of the lake is so dirt that I decided not to go for boating.....

title: Peaceful
review: Peaceful and beautiful lake. It's a vast lake and one can enjoy boating. Good for family picnics. It's the starting point of your Nainital or Mukteshwar trip.
