title: Nice Lake
review: We went for boating to this lake and the place is quite serene and quiet for boating surrounded by lakes

title: not as much delightful than naini lake
review: visited this in evening. they allow only 2 adult+2 children . so 4 adult cann't be fit in one boat . less crowded than naini lake

title: Boating and  Aquarium
review: it is I think the biggest lake of the region with lots of activities for kids and teenager's like boating kayaking bouncy ball in lake they even have a small aquarium which young kids would like

title: Great View
review: It is very beautiful place. Bhimtal lake surrounded by mountains. Where you can enjoy the boating. I love to go again.

title: Island in the Lake
review: A small town with a lovely lake and an island with an aquarium inside. A great place for a picnic and eating out.

title: Quiet lake
review: We chose to have a boat ride at this lake instead of Nainital lake, because it is less crowded. There are several swans in the lake. We had a good time watching swans, young and old, in the lake. There is an aquarium in the lake, which is average.

title: Big
review: Serene ..bigger than the one in nainital.. it has its own charm n draws crowds for those seeking more peace from busy n chaotic nainital.

title: Good lake
review: Though the lake is good but less visited by tourists compared to Naukuchiatal and Nainital. The activities in the lake are bit on low compared to other lakes which are more beautiful as well.

title: Good place
review: Great place to visit once..less crowded then nainital..and in rainy season ,view is serene and  beautiful

title: Lakes @ Nainital
review: Bhimtal lake is one of the seven lakes in Nainital,

title: Not big as Nainital lake
review: Need much work to preserve the lake. cleanliness is big issue.

title: Beautiful lake and paragliding
review: There is a very beautiful lake. You can enjoy here. The town has paragliding facility also. It depends on weather and wind. A nice place to visit.  The town does not have other good facilities and restaurents (need to check on this ).

title: Boat ride at Bhimtal Lake
review: We had a wonderful experience this month when we took a boat ride on this lake. It was  calm and peaceful experience away from all the made rush with the breath of fresh air. They have fixed rates for boat rides which is displayed. Very scenic and enjoyable. You must go around 5 pm to really enjoy both the view at dusk and the view when lights are lit all around. In the vent you wish to visit the aquarium in the centre of the lake then you need to go early around 3 pm. Aquarium is not that great though!! One can capture lovely pictures. Great place to see!! Some kiosks are available to have quick bites. The lemon drink was nice and refreshing.

title: nice lake
review: Nice lake smaller than naini but good place.

title: Huge pleasent Lake
review: The place is nice, small shops, great place to put your feet in cold water and chill for hours, maggi, freshlime soda, along side. aquarium in the middle of the lake is a must watch ask the boat guy to wait there.

title: awesome peaceful lake
review: Went for a ride in boat and it was awesome experience.

title: Beautiful lake
review: Nice lake. Boating is available. Visit bhimeshwar mahadev temple. Centuries ago there was a ancient temple

title: Calm and beautiful
review: Beautiful lake as the crowd mostly goes to nainital.. Very calm lake and can spend the whole day here.. The tea shop makes amazing tea here.. Worth tasting it..

title: Beauty and Peace!
review: I visited Bhimtal Lake in December. It was beautiful. Surrounded with mountains a still lake. We went to the aquarium by boat. Boating was fun but aquarium is nothing great. But if you are there, then that it is only a place to see. Rest sit there enjoy your time with the street food available near the lake.

title: Awesome experience
review: One of the best hotel visited so far.. will recomend my friends and family members for hotel harshikar, also will suggest harshikhar management to open one more branch in nainital as they have the best hospitality and excelent customer service.

title: Lake
review: Very good and big lake with boating facility we enjoyed boating and swimming with permission we tried fishing also. In the evening time the lake looks awesome

title: Beautiful
review: mesmerizing place... no hustle bustle very peaceful unlike naini lake... not too many activities..  away from noise pollution

title: Looks Good
review: The place is smaller than Nainital, but larger than Naukuchiatal. For the shopaholics the place does not offer much. I would choose this place only if resorts around this place can offer something special

title: If you are at Bhimtal- this you should not miss
review: The drive itself to the Bhimtal is divine.. It seems you are getting to the womb of the earth.. spiraling down endlessly.. Must go for boating for sure. Choose Paddle boats. The stalls for food at the side of the Taal offer to make you fresh food isf you have the time on you... Else enjoy the Maggi, cooked in the most indigenous style for you, with hot tea to refresh you like never before.

title: nice place to be
review: the Lake is the biggest among the all , this is quiet place compared to naintaal and naukuchia taal.

title: Lake in Valley
review: The visit to this lake was good. Though nothing exceptional, but lake is much bigger than Nainital. If they had developed the area around lake like in Nainital, the tourism would have been much more. One shall drive down to United 21 hotel on top of a hill and to paragliding location from this place.

title: nice
review: The Bhimtal Lake is one of the most beautiful lakes in Uttrakhand. It is a place of serenity and calm, away from the hustle bustle of the city. The view of the lake is beautiful and the experience is furthur enriched when one takes a shikara for boating in the lake. One must definitely visit the aquarium built in the middle of the lake. Apart from the aquarium, one can visit the Bhimtal Mahadev Temple. Away from the crowd and city life, this lake is a heavenly delight.

title: An in between destination
review: The lake is less populated than Nainital but more populated than Sattal which i would prefer over this. Nor does it have a mall road or jungle stay which makes it an in between option.

title: It was all about lakes
review: We covered all the 4 places together i.e Nainital, Bhimtal, Sattal and Naukuchital. And frankly speaking I was little bored seeing all the same types of lake. But still I would say it was better than Nainital because it was less commercialized and less crowded.

title: Lake
review: Good but not better than Naini Lake. the Paragliding activities near this lake is much enjoyable for every one.

title: Very clean and well maintained.
review: The lake is beautiful. The best part is that it is not too crowded and not to commercial. You can enjoy the nature.

title: Nice serene lake
review: Nice serene lake. You may drive around it, walk around, or simply sit by and watch the surroundings. No activities in the lake as such except boating

title: Beautiful !
review: A beautiful quite place with great view. The lake is clean with friendly fishes and swans. There is an island with fish aquarium, managed by government. One must avoid visiting that

title: Not as good as Nainital
review: A good place for a 30 minute sight-seeing. does not have a major market or any other place to roam around.

title: Superb lake and enjoyable boating!!!
review: Lake is superb however the lake is bigger than Nainital and is much for serene and away from hustle and bustle.Boating especially with shikara is quite enjoyable.

title: Awesome beauty
review: What a place in Bhimtal. If you are planning to visit Nainital and near by area then stay in Bhimtal. It is far better than Nainital places. Take a hotel in front of this lake. You will love the view from room. It is very calm and cool place in this area.

title: Lesser crowded than Nainital
review: Bhimtal is a bigger lake than Nainital but it's less commercialized, the boating and excursions are not as good as Nainital but if you like lesser crowds its the place for you. Unfortunately there are no street lights around the lake (like Nainital)so avoid late night walks. The eastern edge of the lake is perfect for morning walks, the first rays of early sun are just breathtaking. Choose kmvn rest house to stay, good place to stay for one day.

title: Less commercialized than Nainital
review: A good weekend destination. Not much to do, but it can be a point from where one day trips can be made to Mukteshwar, Ranikhet, etc.

title: Relaxed Place
review: A good place to go to for a relaxed stay if you can take the pathetic traffic enroute from & to Delhi. Only road which connects to this place so in case of any road repairs( which we faced) it is very painful compounded by the ill behaved local drivers besides the taxi drivers which creates needless jams. Otherwise once you have reached & settled down, it is fine. A drive to some of the taals is good but be wise to avoid the crowded ones!!!

title: Bhimtal lake
review: Very calm, peaceful. No crowds. Pleasant weather. Lots of ducks near the temple. There is boating , para gliding. Cycling and mountain biking possible

title: Quiet and calm beauty
review: If by any chance , you want to bypass crazy mob surrounding Nainitaal lake, think of Bhimtal, 20 km away from nainitaal. It is a very good stop gap option if you are travelling to other places in kumayon. Stay in KMVN for good stay @moderate charges ( you may opt for Cottages), The night views are stunning from the rooms. The lake offers peaceful ambience for boating , even you can take stride along with the road. There are small market places around Bhimtal, a low budget shopping of woollens will be good.

title: Good lake
review: Good lake. Looks good even in the dark with the lights all around. Can be worth a visit when around.

title: Amazed indeed!!
review: First of all, never expected to see a lake all of a sudden among all the hills around you. The view was enough. Best for long walks and calm surroundings.

title: Nice option to check out on a visit to Nainital
review: The Bhimtal lake - Don't know about the facts but I personally believe it to be the longest of all lakes in the Saat tal region. One look at it and it enchants you. Start in a car by its side and it makes you feel for quite sometime that it might just stretch on forever.

title: Largest lake and very beautiful
review: very beautiful natural beauty,enjoyed boating and zobbling with my family .Bhimtal is specially famous for Paragliding so one must go for outdoor adventures  when in Bhimtal.

title: Fantastic tourist place
review: This place is fantastic and with perfect weather this surely can make your trip truly memorable.

title: Nice Lake
review: Better than Nainital if you're looking for peace. I visit Island aquarium. He is very osum and beautiful.

title: Very big lake
review: We just have a lake view from hotel. Got some chanting religious songs in the evening from an small temple in middle of Bhimtal lake. It has very soothing effect.

title: amazing view near the lake
review: lake is nice time pass, boat ride and horse riding nearby was worth.

title: Centre of Attraction
review: The lake here is the only place in Bhimtal but is very quiet and clean. Locals even try swimming here. Stalls around the lake provide us ample things to eat and enjoy the beauty of the lake. A small island with a tree inside looks amazing. Life is slow, just chill and enjoy

title: Scenic
review: Lake is located little far from the main city of nainital.Its good to see it while going back to kathgodam if u are travelling by train.Its scenic.There is a restaurant on the lake.There are many resorts near bhimtal.

title: Nice Lake.
review: This is big. Serene. The road circumferring the lake is really good. You can paddle boat as well. Enjoyable.

title: A fresh change
review: The lake is the heartbeat for the small town of Bhimtal. Most of the town is surviving around the lake. The lake also offers a few watersports activities and a museum in the centre which can only be accessed through a ferry.  Lake Parikrama can be done either by walking around or even cycling which is a pleasant ride though the traffic is also allowed on one side the road hence you will end up meeting trucks and busses and cabs with honking and pollution.

title: calm and peaceful
review: It is  a big lake , very beautiful and serene with a great view, it lies in the valley surrounded by  mountains.

title: Boating on the lake
review: It was a nice experience and the feeling was quite serene. There is a fish aquarium in the middle of lake which houses fishes of different varieties. The lake is clean and is home to some ducks.. which adds on to the experience

title: Visit to Bhimtal Lake and Temple
review: I have been visiting this lake almost annually since last few years. This December 2015 I had the chance to visit it again with few friends as we were on way to a hiking trip. We visited the lake around 830 AM and it looked splendid. It is one of the biggest lake in this region in terms of area. There are plenty of food stalls around though not many were open early morning. The view of the lake is very good and it is worth visiting if you are around, they also organize boating at the lake though we didn't try!!

title: beautiful lake
review: lake is very beautiful you see lots ducks  in the lake. in the back side the mountains are so beautiful the increase the beauty of lake very much

title: lake surrounded by mountains.
review: Breathe in the beauty of the place small boats like shikaras take you to the aquarium in the middle of the lake.

title: Quite place even at the time of New Year
review: Bhimtal is situated at a lower altitude then Nainital, Its a quite place, even at the time of Christmas it was not crowded. you can reach here in 1/2 hr from Nainital. Its a bigger lake and you will find shikara and kayaks here.

title: Paragliding
review: Eco paragliding ppl conduct very memorable paragliding experience for us folks! The duration was less coz of winds as well as the winter chill down draft reducing the air time! The guys are well trained!

title: Quiet & scenic..combine with all other Taals !
review: Bhimtal is roughly an hour from Nainital..it is more secluded and tends not to have the mad rush of Nainital..

title: Beautiful, peaceful place
review: Starting, lake is huge.

title: bhimtal lake
review: Bhimtal lake is a big and very neat and clean and you Can enjoy boat ride here.very very beautiful place.

title: Beautiful lake
review: Nice, clean and beautiful. There is an island in middle of lake and one can take boat rides around it. One cna even spot ducks in the lake.

title: Bhimtal
review: Beautiful  experience ...The lake was bigger than the Nani lake ...ducks added further  to its beauty...

title: Serene
review: The only word I can put across is "SERENE". Go there, sit quiet and experience it. It is for the traveller to experience. Nature displaying its beauty!!

title: A lovely shikara boat ride
review: On a quite day, you should explore this option. It is worth the experience. The guide can narrate the history behind this lake.

title: Great boating experience
review: The lake is about 15 kms away from the Nainital lake and hence less tourists are there. Serene and pristine atmosphere with no interruptions which we enjoyed for hours

title: lovely lake
review: bhimtal one of the fascinating lake ...one of the quit and nice place...surrounded with hills and nice mahadev temple...you will love boating experience.

title: Nice place
review: Boat ride was good. Peacefull environment. Para gliding was awesome. Crowd was very less in December. Cofee at parking place is very good.

title: Stay should be here & one day visit to nainital
review: Lake with an Island within 20 kms from Nainital, do boating upto island and see the aquarium on island. Also walk around the lake in night is awesome. stay in country inn is awesome, i would suggest to stay here instead of nainital

title: Beauty
review: Lovely clean lake. Its just beautiful place to visit if u really interested in peacful place after hectic life in metropoltn. You should visit nd relax facing the lake. No noise fresh air wat else u need t relax ur mind

title: Gud place
review: Nainital lake is very famous for boating..you can do paddle boating for fun....apart from it there is a game zone too....

title: Beautiful Lake
review: A nice and clean lake with awesome natural beauty. Boating was exceptional at this lake due to its beauty.

title: Great Lake
review: Really liked the Lake. Out of the crowd, pleasant, calm....just seat on your hotel balcony with a cup of tea/ any drink of ur choice, feel the cool wind coming from the lake. People who want to avoid crowd during holidays , just choose Bhimtal in place of Nainital.

title: Excellent Place
review: Excellent place to send few hours anytime in the year. Its one of the place you must include in your travel plan.

title: Paragliding
review: You may be approached by representatives from two groups, Eagleeye & Hawkeye, quoting ₹900 for paragliding with their business cards. I realised this is false when I drove uphill to the site. The price is ₹1500-1200 depending upon the height of their take-off point. It's a 4-minute flight which could be longer under favorable wind conditions. I wouldn't really recommend it because there are other locations which offer a better experience for either the same price or marginally higher. Time and money could be better spend elsewhere while in Bhimtal.

title: Nature at it's best
review: This lake is situated in the middle of Bhimtal.It’s huge and the water is clean,calm and view is beautiful from the lake as it is surrounded by mountains on all sides.You can hire a shikaras and take a round on the lake.There is also provision for paragliding if one is adventurous.There is a small aquarium on the lake though I did not visit it and also a Lord Shiva Temple on one side of the lake which is called Dat.

title: Good spot
review: Average place nothing much to see... Need not to visit aquarium or boating...

title: Excellent Place to visit
review: The lake with great natural beauty. One must love boating at this lake, due to its natural surroundings. Its a big lake, calm place.

title: Lake was found to be in a state of neglect!
review: After visiting Nainital Lake, we returned towards Rudrapur and stopped by at Bhimtal Lake but were taken aback to find this large lake in a state of neglect. A large part was covered with algae and wild grass was seen on the walking areas. Ropes were lying around carelessly, posing threat to old people. Needs immediate attention of the authorities.

title: Calm, peaceful and beautiful lake
review: Bhimtal lake is really calm, peaceful and beautiful lake. Unlike nainital lake which is too much crowded, this one is scarcely crowded and relatively very much smaller. Boating in this lake gives great pleasure. There is a small island portion in this lake in which aquarium is located. Air filled circular balloons are available in the lake which can give you real fun and joy. One can reach that through boat and visit the various types of fishes maintained there. The aquarium was maintained good though entry fees was a bit overpriced. View point for the lake is located on top of the aquarium building from which you can take photographs with various backgrounds of the lake. There is a small dam with sluice arrangement from which water from the lake flows out as a stream, the access gate for which was closed though. Bathing is not allowed in this lake and this attraction is good picnic spot. This lake is named historically after Bheema , the details of which you can search in the internet.

title: Lovely Sight
review: It's a wonderful sight to see the lake and it has quite a few people out on the sunny day taking a ride in a boat.

title: Visit to Bhimtal and Nainital
review: finding a long weekend, decided to take a road trip to Nainital with family. Since we stayed in Ninital before, this time we decided to stay in a place with less commercial activity yet in exclusive locale in the Tal- valey. And Bhimtal as the location and the Maple Hermitage for met our requirement.

title: Calm and peaceful lake
review: Bhimtal lake is really calm, peaceful and beautiful lake. Unlike nainital lake which is too much crowded, this one is scarcely crowded and relatively big than nanital lake. Boating in this lake gives great pleasure.

title: Such Tranquillity Feels like time travel,
review: I always thought this beauty can be experienced only through time travel, Our Indian population has destroyed all such natural beauty. But for Nainital and Bhimtal, Wonderful lake. No crowd. Just enjoy. Don't forget the life jackets. I saw many people not buckling it up. The boatman says it ok, make it fast and all that. But our safety is important for us. If, God forbid, someone falls inside the lake, not buckling will help only the jacket to float and the person will be sinking. No point in wearing a life jacket then. So ignore boatman's words and buckle up your life jacket. Enjoy the boat ride.

title: Very beautiful
review: We visited aquarium which is in the middle of the lake..there were many type fishes..although you dont have much to do..but you will enjoy the ride till the aquarium and the aquarium itself.

title: Good but not great
review: Good but not great. One can easliy skip this as other lakes like Naini and Sattal are better place to spend time.

title: Nice place
review: Boting over the surface of Bhimtal is a nice experience and the aquarium inside the lake is small but clean and well maintained

title: Nice Experience
review: Did round of the lake ..it is always nice to take boat ride as one gets 360° view of the surroundings. Good place. Folks will charge you Rs 260 for 30 mins. ie. 60 bucks extra than they charge in Nainital or Naukuchiytal as they every lake association is different. But that's absolutely okay as long as guy rowing the boat is a good guide.

title: nice little lake..
review: a clean lake 4 boating and some time pass away from the crowd of nainital.. you can also see the aquarium between the lake..

title: Average lake view
review: Just a lake like all other lakes, Beautifully maintained. Boating is available. Not a must visit place

title: Bhimtal Lake and aquarium
review: It is an upcoming attraction, however, we liked the Naini Lake in Nainital better than this one. There is an aquarium in the center of the lake, which is not much big and hosts only a few variety of fishes.

title: Good to visit
review: You can visit here for Boating, Paragliding, Canal view, lake side view, peace, hangout, temple, food lovers.

title: Commercialised but yet fun to hang around
review: You can experience rowing your own boat here, and other water sports available too. Mornings are usually rushed. The market nearby isn't expensive too.

title: serene waters
review: 8ts difficult to imagine that such a serene lake can exist in a top tourist destination in India. It is fairly large, calm and surrounded by the Himalayas. There is a road running around the lake which is narrow and quaint and perfect for a romantic stroll..

title: Good lake
review: Equally beautiful as naini lake with aquarium situated on the island in the middle of bhimtal lake...one can also enjoy boating and various other activities in Bhimtal

title: Excellent lake...very well maintained
review: Good lake, well maintained. Tout free.

title: biggest lake of nainital
review: it is the biggest lake of nainital with 1.7 km in length and about 0.5 km in width. depth is 18 m. kayak boating is a must there.

title: Nothing great, Don't waste your time !
review: Its just a normal lake with nothing special or scenic around. If you have been to Nainital, its pointless to travel to Bhimtal for its lake. Naninital lake is a beauty and must visit. This one lacks big time.

title: YOU RELIASE THAT MORE IN THE WORLD THAN WHAT YOU IMAGINED EARLIER
review: Very near to Nainital,a place worth visiting. Well maintained lake with boating facilities.Calm place with sceinic beauty and a temple nearby.

title: Calm and Serene Lake with breathtaking view
review: Amazing lake. It is much less crowded than the Naini lake and hence appears much more serene. Ample of adventur activites are available at the shore including Kayaking, Boating and Zorbing.

title: Superb !
review: We were there on a family trip and enjoy the view of Bhimtal lake & Dam. we also paid homage at the Lord Shiva temple (purportedly built by Bhima).

title: Good city and lake
review: It is a very good lake and the person visiting Nainital should must vist. Boating can be done on nominal charges.The weather was cool.

title: Visiting Nainital, we decided to stay at the hotel near Bhimtal, falling in love with this place.
review: Very quiet and serene. Little traffic around the lake, to let you enjoy the nature's bounty at the fullest.

title: Beautiful  lake...with even more beautiful  weather..
review: Lake is beautiful  and clean. .we enjoyed rappling out there with  my friends...

title: Picturesque Landscape
review: Bhimtal lake looks right out of an artist's canvas. The lake is comparatively less popular among tourist is actually more beautiful, serene calm and clean. Our driver took to this place first and we completely fell in love with this place. As we had to visit many other places, we couldn't stay for much time. But people planning to visit Nainital can plan to stay here, as it's a less populated place and the ambiance is just awesome. The place is very neat and clean perfect for spending time away from hustle bustle.

title: the walk by the lake
review: Bhimtal is less celebrated in comparison to other cousins in Nanital, but it's much greener, much quieter and much more serene. You can sit beside the lake and admire the beautiful sleeping town of Bhimtal. The place has many temples and you can see a few besides the lake as well. just walk around the lake and you will feel completely rejuvenated

title: Beautiful serene calm
review: This lake is 22 kms from Nainital and only 7 kms away from Naukchaital. Much less crowded, with good options to eat in and stay at. Boating here is a different experience than Nainitaal, it seems like your own personal lake.

title: Bheemtal visit
review: the experience here is awesome.  lake is big and boat ride is a must.  There is museum in the middle of the lake.

title: Wow Experience for all
review: Nice & cool place for fun with family, friends, couples of all age.

title: Visit
review: Kp up the good work.Best hotel local place to relax with family.Food excellent ,well maintained property.will be highly recommend to people.Better than crowd nanital which has become vvv commercial.Economical and does not hurt the pocket .

title: Very Large lake
review: Bhimtal Lake is a lake in the town of Bhimtal, Uttarakhand, India. There is an island at the centre of the lake. It is the largest lake in the only real lake district of India.

title: Lake with aquarium
review: Its a beautiful lake and you'll see lots of ducks and swans making their way amid the boats. You'll also find an aquarium in the mid of the lake and to visit there one need to go through a boat.

title: Cycle trip from Aamod resort
review: Nice, Beautiful clean  lake. We went there early morning around 6.30 AM and it was truly amazing as we cycle around it.

title: Nainital - Jun 2015
review: This is part of the lake tour from Nainital. Bhimtal is a big lake, almost comparable with Nainital. It has a small aquarium inside the lake. The aquarium is actually in a small island in the lake. You need to take a boat ride to visit the aquarium. That was fun. Otherwise boating facility is also available. From view perspective, I think Bhimtal will score low compared to Nainital or Sattal. Not too far from Nainital, around 20-25 KMs. However, it is comparatively at a lower altitude than Nainital. During summer, it might be little warmer.

title: Peaceful!
review: Calm clean lake and we always stay on the lakeside hotel with great views. Unspoilt yet, but for how long I wonder?!

title: Nice lake with clean water
review: I saw this lakes many a times. It is very nice and you can enjoy any time taking walk around the lake or sit and enjoy the natural beauty around. Nearby Hanuman Garhi.

title: Silent Lake
review: Away from the city life, Its a beautiful lake with lot many water sports activity in comparison to Nanital.

title: Very scenery place
review: All area near lake is clean and birds flying everywhere. We took palm st 100 birds picture in our camera. Very good place for kids as well. It can be made a world class place.

title: Nice large lake..
review: It is a nice and very large lake few kilometers from mail nainital market. It is a quite place and not crowded like the nainital lake. You can enjoy the cool breeze near this lake...

title: Nice, beautiful lake. Its history goes back to times of Mahabharat.
review: Bhimtal, credited to have been made by Bhim during Mahabharat times with his mace, is a nice and beautiful lake. This is a very large lake and at its center there is an island which used to be a restaurant earlier but now there is an aquarium there. There is boating facility and this lake does attract lots of visitors. Best time of the day to visit this beautiful lake, more so in summer months is early mornings or late in evenings.

title: Nice please
review: Bhimtal Lake is a lake in the town of Bhimtal, in the Indian state of Uttarakhand, with a masonry dam built in 1883 creating the storage facility.[1] It is the largest lake in Kumaon region, known as the "lake district of India".[2] The lake provides drinking water supply and supports aquaculture with variety of fish species. There is an island at the centre of the lake which has been developed as a tourist attraction and has an aquarium.

title: lovely boating experience
review: Its a beautiful lake with clean green  waters. We enjoyed boating in the lake , it costs 500 bucks for a trip but its worth it. A nice point to relax while returning from Ranikhet or Almora.

title: Boating & fishing
review: Beautiful lake, lots of boating, kayaking and fishing.

title: Clean and Nice
review: Nice to do boating ,is bigger and cleaner than Nainital Lake.Not much traffic around.Is peaceful.Lot of activities for children ,horse riding,water snorkeling,boating ,aquarium in the center of lake.

title: It's just a lake
review: There isn't much to do in Bhimtal, except enjoy the quietude. So we went boating/fishing on the lake one day. The paddle boats were rowed by young, inexperienced boys who didn't make the experience very comfortable. The fishing too was lousy, with no guidance coming from them. And it all costed a bomb -- Rs 600 per boat was a bit steep, I think. There were canoes and zorbing balls also available there.

title: bhimtal
review: there is not much a do in bhimtal-it is only the lake and one hanuman temple worth visiting it may take hardly take one to two hours to finish bhimtal visiting tourist,

title: Beautiful Lake with Boat and other activities
review: This is a beautiful and clean lake for taking rides, ballon facility is also available, however surroundings are not as clean as they should be (in case of Naini Lake they are much better). One can also visit the museum which is in middle of lake.

title: A quaint lake in the hills
review: A quaint lake in the hills.The surrounding hills and the reflection of the greenery in the lake waters make a  very pleasant sight.

title: Nice Place
review: Good place to visit .You can spend a day visiting thr lake and for Flying in air via Paragliding .You can enjot but u need to waLk or climb a lot.

title: Zorbing at Bhimtal
review: Had an amazing experience zorbing at Bhimtal. One can also try kayaking and boating. Its not as commercialized as Nainital and offers a serene environment.

title: Kayaking was fun
review: This lake is less crowded than Nainital.  We enjoyed Kayaking here.  There is shop called Pandey Tea Stall opposite the row boat stand.  Pandeyji serves tea with ginger and elaichi.  Do taste.

title: far better place than nainital
review: boating, parajumping, kayaking. This place is peaceful and still has many activities to do than nearby places.

title: boating at lake
review: Boating Experience is good but maintenance is poor. we are provided with teared life jacket which i have denied. than after waiting for 15 minutes i got another set of jackets.

title: Excellent experiance
review: Bhimtal lake is one of the most beautiful lake in uttrakhand.Which is having fish meuseum in centre.Very cool place honeymoon couples.

title: Nice Lake
review: Worth taking a boat ride on Bhimtal Lake if you are visiting Bhimtal. Ideal to time to take a boat ride in morning or evening specially in summer time. Plenty of other activities in a and around lake.

title: good place to visit with family
review: A bit crowded  it is better to go Naukuchhia Tal near by which is much peasant.. You can also visit Sattal which is also nearby

title: Very Nice
review: If your hotel is in Bhimtal. then u must prefer bhimtal lake over Naini Lake ( which is most popular and crowded) naini lake had a waiting for peddle boat of 1 hour. so it is better to go and visit bhimtal lake which is 20 kms away from the crowded Mall Road.

title: Noise place
review: Too much of tourist and there behavior . Plus now days because of season traffic jam occurs for 1 or 2 hours

title: Okk
review: The lake is quite good for boating but its better to do so in naini lake as water on the lake corners is stinking due to waste accumulation

title: Serene ambience. Quite better than Nainital.
review: There is not much sightseeing to do in Bhimtal. Not much activity as well. I liked the quite and serene nature of this place. Much better place to stay over Nainital.

title: Not too crowded, boating etc available,
review: few lake overlooking hotels, Eateries without lights, shopper agents work too hard to seek customers, in the midst of Bhimtal

title: SO SO
review: not that excting as expected, slow and dull place, just a lake and no attraction there, too much drive from nani lake and still not exciting, restra are good there, had lunch there in one of resta which had good veg indian food.

title: Pleasent River
review: Entire Kumaon region have many tal line nainital, bhimtal, naukuchiatal etc and bhimtal is one of them, this place apart from boating also provides para gliding to the tourist and other activities for small children, the river sight is beautiful and eben if you dont wish to do any activities then sitting by the river side is also very peaceful

title: Nice Lake
review: good places to eat near lake. do try nimbu pani from an Old Man and also has fresh fruits. Nice and calm lake has boating.

title: Nothing great
review: Nothing great and can be left out during the visit to Nainital.  There is nothing around the lake.  There is an aquarium but we had not visited; hence cannot comment on the same

title: Picturesque lake
review: One of the several nice lakes within a 15-20 km radius of Nainital. There is boating available on the lake shore. Also some eating places/roadside stalls.

title: REVIEW OF BHIMTAL LAKE
review: We went to visit the Bhimtal Lake for a day on 22nd of May 2015. It was scorching hot in Bhimtal during the day time but very cool and in the night. Coming to the lake, it is very huge and almost seems to be never ending and gives a panoramic view from a distant height, as you can see in the pictures taken. The boating starts in the evening and is worth a ride, to say the least! The waters however could be kept more cleaned as it houses many mosquitoes and is definitely not a very hygiene idea to hang around them in the lake. Rest, for a weekend short getaway, it is a good place with very good roads to take you up there.

title: Small Lake
review: Not much to do around the lake except a boat ride and an aquarium middle of the lake

title: Bhimtal......green peace....
review: Dotted with small temples atop the green Kumaon hills, and natural fresh water lakes in close proximity, Bhimtal is a serene town, good for relaxation and an enjoyable destination. Most visitors stop here en route to Nainital, but one can stay at the numerous hotels in Bhimtal and make excursions to the nearby lakes and temples. Boating in the lake is a favorite pastime, as this lake is bigger than the Nainital Lake and not as crowded.

title: "Quiet and Serene"
review: This lake is truly magnificent. The lake is very clean. Boating - pedal and manual is available at a reasonable rate. Seeing sunset from this place was also a great expreince.

title: Paragliding & Duck feeding, Aquarium
review: One can do paragliding jst 2 kms from bhimtal on the way to nau kuchia tal. At bhimtal, you can visit the island in lake to see aquarium and can also do kayaking.

title: Peaceful
review: One more lake within the lake district !  Have a peaceful walk around and some maggi at the stall.... beautifully surrounded by some ducks and swans....

title: Clean and serene...
review: Good Points:

title: Nice and less crowded than Nainital
review: We enjoyed the Bhimtal, it is less crowded and does not have big shops/malls/food joints like nainital,It is beautiful with fresh breeze.

title: Peaceful Place
review: It was very peaceful in morning hours.  We were the first to reach and do boating. You can pose for a picture with some Kumaoni dress on rent here.

title: bhimtal is better then nainital
review: i was in uttrakhand last month, and seen many other hill stasion al well, but bhimtal is very good , staff, location , away from city hotel are very good

title: Beautiful and peaceful
review: Very well kept lake with a lovely circuit around it to walk/ bike and a temple and sitting area made for lovely views (and picture opportunities). Not crowded like its nearby Nainital, was such a quaint yet lovely place, I would recommend strongly to visit

title: Superb
review: Awsome view...

title: Nice n peaceful
review: Bhimtal lake is perhaps the only major attractions of bhimtal . About n hour drive from kathgodam n same from nainital too . Lake is big beautiful surroundins not as commercialised and noisy as nainital . Boating kayaking n aquazorbing are the activities you could do here . Check prices and duration beforehand . We ended up paying 220 rs for 15 min boat ride . By the side of lake you get masala cucumber ,kadi chawal ,rajma chawal  . Rituraj is a small resturant but serves good food and nice parathas .

title: calm,cool khamosh jheel for nature lovers
review: I visited bhimtal lake 18 may night...this is a lake paradise for nature lovers..jo shanti pana chahte hain...peaceful lake awayfrom maddning crowd of nainital and very defining island with fish aquarium..superb location..mesmerizing natural beauty

title: Great Views
review: Huge lake and fantastic views. Boating is done on the lake and is quite and romantic. Fishing is also possible if you are interested.

title: APPLAUDABLE VISIT
review: The loveliest part was the scenic beauty,my stay by the lake.

title: Rank 3 after Sattal, Naukuchiatal
review: It is for sure huge lake but after seeing Satal and Naukuchiatal you may not find it attractive. Best is to have a short ride to the Aquarium, see few beautiful fish along with empty spaces with no fishes and also the Coral along with Star fish. Do't forget to climb up. You get a beautiful view. Post the ride, take a walk to the dam like thing where the other side you have a temple. Nice place to visit there and the walk on the dam is also nice. But beware of the rude motorist, they ride really rough. Not sure why they allow motor vehicles.

title: Great
review: Its a nice lake view, covered with green trees, trees makes its water green. Finally we can say if you are planning to go to Nainital so I must say you don't miss the natural beauty of Bhimtal.

title: Good place for a lazy relaxed outing
review: Not very crowded and not very isolated.

title: Good experience
review: Visit the lake in the evenings.

title: Stay Bhimtal while visiting Nainital
review: It a secluded, peaceful, less crowded! Isn't too far from Nainital (20 kms). Must visit Italiano restaurant approx. 3 kms from Bhimtal for nice food & view all around.

title: no big deal!
review: The aquarium is a real let down and the boat guys are just out to rip you off. If you want to do the 'touristy' thing and have to go for a boat ride, then it's ok! The geese in the lake are delightful though! Head to Pannatal nearby for a nice peaceful lake visit

title: Bhimtal Lake
review: Excellent lake, boating in the lake is awesome, just sit back in the boat and relax and the boatman will take you around the lake, there is option of kayaking also

title: picnic at bhim tal lake
review: This is a great place to visit and enjoy the scenery.But keep away from self appointed guides,who will waste your time taking you to pedestrian eating joints and unethical vendors.

title: quietnesssss Shhh;;;;;;
review: i like its hugeness ,its quietness ,its beauty,Its road side flow ;

title: Beautiful ....
review: Bhimtal Lake is a lake in the town of Bhimtal, Uttarakhand, India. There is an island at the centre of the lake. It is the largest lake in the only real lake district of India.

title: Lake is good
review: In the monsoons, the lake has a different feel about it. It is big and well shaped. The museum at the centre is worth a watch, but its nothing gr8 to write about. The boating is very quiet in the Bhimtal , though it might scare some ppl, but its thrilling at the same time to go so deep in the lake. Its shape is different from naini lake and is less crowded which makes it quieter.

title: Magnificent View
review: Magnificent View. You can go along with friends there are activities that can be done as a group.. Near to that is Nakuchital where you can do para gliding which in itself is an excellent experience....

title: Truly a Gem
review: Bhimtal Lake is a lake in the town of Bhimtal, Uttarakhand, India. There is an island at the centre of the lake.

title: Beautiful & Serene !
review: Bhimtal Lake is a beautiful lake with an Aquarium to boast. The lake is big with crystal clear water. You won't find my boating avenues & so its less crowded.

title: Not great
review: The Bhimtal lake is like a regular lake where boating etc happens. However, its way too commercialized with the entire circumference of the kale being covered by either roads or hotels. The Sattal lake was far better as it is surrounded by beautiful mountains and is serene.

title: serene & calm
review: Lake is beautiful. our hotel was on the banks of lake. It offered a great view. Lake was calm and peaceful. though little scary when one goes on boat side in lake. must watch aquarium on the island..

title: bhimtal lake
review: This is one of the biggest lake of nainital. There is road which curcimfence the lake which can be leisurely strolled for a walk. There are duck and a small aqurariumin the middle of the lake in small island which has some rare fishes. Note it opens by 11:00 am only

title: Nice boating view
review: The lake has boating facility. They charge 260/- as on April 2015. The calm water of lake and cool breeze gives an enjoying feeling while boating. There is an aquarium inside the lake. One can see ducks in the lake too.

title: A nothing lake
review: Just another lake. Nothing musch to see or do. Doesnt seem to be developed by the authorities. when we visited in 2007, there were at least some ducks in the water and the water was clean. This time it was real dirty near the shore with the tourists having thrown junk into the lake. Sad. But the air is clean, the view is good. Not much of shopping around, nothing much else actually.

title: Calm Lake
review: Very Calm lake...very relaxing to see.....aquarium in the center of the lake is another attraction here

title: Such a beautiful lake!
review: Once can easily sense the years of history that this lake holds. It is simply beautiful and a big lake! A heaven of sorts for photography enthusiasts, nature lover and bird watchers. Do visit this place!

title: Pleasant Lake of Bhimtal
review: The lake is considered to be associated with Lord Bhima, and the town of Bhimtal is surrounded by the Lake giving a lovely view when surrounded by clouds all over. It is around 20kms from Nainital and 35 - 40 min drive from Kathgodam Railway Station. Many Resorts are surrounded by the lake.

title: Serenity !!
review: The calmness surrounding this lake is an experience to soak in. The beauty of the lake likes in the fact that it is on an off beaten track and much less publicized than Nainital and less crowded too. I ended up spending complete two days in a nearby home stay to be able to take in the magnificence of this place !!

title: Stay here for a day.. It is indeed serene...
review: Amazing place.. If you are visiting Nainital.. do visit this lake... Make a point to stay here for atleast 1 night.. The view from Aamod Resort is breathtaking. The resort itself is good...

title: Another Lake
review: Lake is bigger in size to naini lake, around 180 feet deep and 1700×500 meter with a island.  Surrounded on one side by road, while other sides by mountains.  Surrounding road is not lively as of naini lake. Good for those who think lively means crowded (love birds). At one end there is market with few hotels and eating points.

title: The Lake is Shrinking!
review: As you drive around Bhimtal lake what strikes you most is how massively the lake area has shrunk, especially during the summer months. The place where the boat rides start from is on the opposite side of the highway route.

title: Civil Engineering Novelty
review: Bhim Tal was just five km away from Sat Tal . Being the biggest lake in Kumaon it is aptly and fondly called Bhim Tal . As usual we hired a rowing boat but looking to the periphery of the lake devoid of dense forest all along , I asked the oarsman to take us along the bank to the Bhimeshwar Mahadev temple built in the 17th Century by Baz Bahadur of Chand dynasty . While the oarsman was rowing the boat we could enjoy Lesser whistling teals swimming along the boat . A wedged tail green pigeon  was looking at us from a tree top . A trickell’s thrush was sifting the dry leaves on the ground . On one big branch of deodar tree a Rusty cheeked Scimitar babbler and a Slaty  headed parakeet were quarreling over something .

title: Awesome
review: The boat ride and the beautiful mountain view.....just awesome. The boatman was very friendly and since we went in a off season the price for the boating was also a bit less and he took us around for longer time then usual.

title: Nature at its best!!!
review: Far from the crowds of Nainital, this place offers peace and much more natural beauty. Yes, the mall road is one thing it can definitely improve upon. But otherwise, the lake is huge, well-kept and one who intends to walk around the lake amidst the quietness of this place will be a happy soul.

title: Bhimtal Lake
review: A small lake with a basic, small aquarium in the middle of it. Though there is not much to do around the area, we enjoyed the hot street food around it. However, the shop owners nearby esp Kashmiri ones really get after you to buy there "special offer" merchandise.

title: Nice calm place
review: A nice place to be there. Its very calm and less commercialized as compare to Nainital. I wanted to stay in a calm place without the city noise and this place is fitting the situation nicely.

title: Quiet & serene
review: It's a beautiful & serene lake. Since the place is not commercialized & cluttered, the entire area is a bliss for nature lovers. Enjoyed long morning walks along the edges of the lake!!!

title: Nice lake with an Aquarium in the middle...
review: Another lake in this region but what makes it different is a well maintained aquarium situated on an island in the middle of this lake. If you are travelling with small children, they will love this place which is full of ducks and an small aquarium. Boats are required to go to the island. Ticket charges- Rs. 60 (per person) for aquarium and Rs. 110 for boat (to and fro). Do sit for some time on the roof of the aquarium to have a panoramic view of the place. A must visit.

title: Good place that lacks good food
review: Nice place to be for boating and beauty, however lacks good food. There are many shops but food appears to be unhygenic and one has to rely upon the tuck shops selling maggi, bread omlettes, tea etc.

title: One of many beautiful lakes in and around nainital
review: loved the atmosphere, the quiet, the calm walk around the lake at night...

title: Better lake
review: Bhimtal is far better in comparison to Nainital. I would recommend, skip nainital and instead visit Bhimtal

title: Serene Lake
review: Nice lake and has an aquarium in its island. Nice to take the kid. Kayaking also available. Could be made more beautiful. Mosquitoes were there in some parts of the lake.

title: Visited the Aquarium....
review: Went to see the bhimtal lake. There is an Aquarium at center of lake. Only access is by Boat.

title: Thanks
review: Dirty to the core. Not worth a boat trip. Suggest no one to stay on the main road especially at van vilas. The hotel is dirty and is not worth a penny

title: Bigger than other lakes near Nainital
review: At 1371 Meters, about 22 kms from Nainital, nestled in a beautiful pristine valley, this lake is the largest around Nainital named after Bhima of Mahabharata. One road from Bhimtal leaves for Naukuchiatal while the another one goes to Kathgodam 21 Kms from here. It has a island in the center approached only by a boat that used to have a restaurant and at present it has an Aquarium there. A gaggle of ducks has made the lake their home and give company to the lake visitor. Bhimtal is much less crowded than Nainital and the lake, Bhimtal is much cleaner than it's better known counterpart Nainital. There is a large Victorian dam at one end of the Bhimtal lake and terraced flower gardens can be found on either side. Next to the dam is the Bhimkeshwar temple dedicated to Bhim.

title: Bhimtal best avoided
review: A very poorly managed tourist spot by the authorities...Bhimtal displays the sheer indifference of our administrative system and the quality of people that man it. There couldn't be a more dirtier hill station than this one.It epitomizes what all should not be done to make a livable and eco friendly hill station.There is hardly any waste management, no sewage and filthiest of roads, markets and surrounding areas. Putrid is the word!!

title: nice lake
review: Not very big,,,actually dried up at the edges. But a clean lake. Boating is a nice experience. Don't forget to buy some bread. Feeding the ducks is an awesome experience.

title: nice quiet place
review: nice and quite place with not much of rush.view from lake is good can do kayaking there reasonably safe.do try d Maggi and rajma chawal sold there aquarium in d middle of lake is worth visiting once

title: Clean and bigger lake than Nainital
review: Clean and bigger lake than Nainital. One can enjoy boating, but it is going to be same experience if you've already done that in Nainital. The aquarium in middle of lake is best avoided. Plenty of options are there near lake to eat. Go for other attractions nearby. Place is worth a visit.

title: Serene and peaceful !!
review: Very peaceful and serene surroundings. It's a great feeling to go boating on this lake. Don't miss it for anything !!

title: Surrounded by beautiful mountains
review: While Bhimtal lake is just like any other lake but my 2 year old daughter loved feeding the ducks. The boat ride is fairly ordinary but if you are lucky with the weather, then the visit becomes very pleasant. The mountains around the lake are the real highlight.

title: Quieter than nainital
review: This place is 26 kms away from nainital at little lower altitude the advantage of Bhimtal is that its a quiet place and will be enjoyed mostly by people who loves loneliness , the boating will be same experience as of nainital. Some people say that this lake is cleaner than nainital but I don't think so finally don't get fooled by visiting aquarium its not worth 60 rs per ticket and 110 of boat fare

title: Beautiful Lake with Aquarium in the middle
review: Its a beautiful and big lake and main attraction of Bhimtal. There was an old fellow who rowed the boat for us and best part was the beautiful aquarium (having separtae ticket ofcourse) with different types of fish which kids enjoyed the most

title: Very quite n beautiful lake
review: Bhimtal is 22km away from Nainital. Very quite n beautiful lake, nice place to visit for couples. You can enjoy boat ride here with beautiful scenery. It has a aquarium which is on the island in the lake, You can reach there by boat.

title: We missed the boating :-(
review: Bhimtal lake is a Big Lake near Nainital. This place is a bit commercialised and not quiet as Sattal or Naukuchiyatal. There are shops and hotels all around. The lake looks awesome. We missed the boat ride because of winds. A must visit place if you are in Nainital

title: excellent
review: Bhimtal Lake is a lake in the town of Bhimtal, Uttarakhand, India. There is an island at the centre of the lake. It is the largest lake in the only real lake district of India. It is a perennial lake which not only supports a large variety of aquatic life but is a winter stopover for Trans Himalayan birds.

title: Good outing at a Hill Station - Nainital
review: Been there with family on my return from Jim Corbett. It is a very commercialized hill station. Very crowded unless you stay outside the town. Quite some attractions around.

title: Peaceful than Nainital ...
review: If you are looking for peaceful hill station the this place is for you. it's around 20 km from nainital a very beautiful and close to nature.  Its entirely different from the crowded nainital whose street always filled with tourists.

title: Nice lake with small island
review: This place is very peaceful and away from crowded Nainital. There is small island in middle of this lake where is turned in Aquarium. Boats available to visit the same, so boating is clubbed with aquarium fun. My kids enjoyed big variety of fishes there. There is also one viewpoint on the island, one can relax there.

title: Nice lake..
review: We visited Bhimtal lake along with few other lakes in the vicinity. . Nothing extraordinary but it is definitely less commercialized than Nainital. . The aquarium in the middle is a waste of time.. it is clean and you could spend an hour with cool breeze and calm atmosphere. .

title: Superb
review: Its serene and scenic....boating is fun here as there's also an aquarium in the middle of the lake which is good.

title: lake
review: lake is fine if u want to boating so pl here.Nanital is famous place but boating enjoyment is in " bhimtal ".

title: Special Place just to sit, relax and take memorable photos
review: Bhimtal to me is a special place where u can sit for hours around the lake in calm atmosphere without too much of a hustle and bustle.

title: Feel like you are part of that area.
review: I have visited this place during the diwali with one of my friend. and we stayed at a small hotel just along the lake. you can just enjoy thee lake directly from there. we stayed and feel like we are not a tourist we are the local people there. the hotel is also so homely and the food also. also we explore all over the place and tried different things y sitting along the lake or exploring some small restaurant. Its so good if you take a walk in the early morning along the lake is so amazing. its little cold in the morning. One morning we are walking and trying to find some new place for breakfast we saw a place called home food and we go that restaurant. Its one family they are living there and in there garden they have made restaurant. when you order food that will be made from there home kitchen. also we have ordered some fresh Litchi Juice which they took from the tree and freshly made the juice, and it so good.  we have a talk wiht the family and then we left to explore for some more......

title: Bhimtal & Nainital during Moonsoons
review: Great Place.. Serene, with lush green forests on mountain ranges and lakes in valleys. Must visit to experience and breathe the fresh air and see behold the mind-blowing scenery all over...

title: Bigger than Naini lake!!!
review: huge lake with very good facilities of boating..click as many photos as u can..you can visit aquarium within the lake in a small island..every people should visit this place as sightseeing option while visiting nainital..or else you can stay here for a night also..lot of hotels are nearby.

title: Good for First Timer
review: This region of Kumaon is filled with Lakes. Travelers find their favorites. Having two houses over looking two different Lakes and staying for long stays in the past 40 years and having visited majority of the lakes umpteen times, Bhimtal is my least favorite. Yes its a Favourite of travel agents.

title: Away from crowd
review: Sit, Relax and enjoy tea/coffee. There is hardly any crowd to bother and you can stare at the calmness of lake and beauty of mountains for hours.

title: bhimtal lake,nainital-a serene beauty
review: my first visit to nainital was in 2009,decembar,i had seen many attractions in nainital including naini lake,sat tal & pachkuchia tal but seeing bhimtal,I was spellbound by its beauty & an atmosphere of sereneness which we find durung deep meditation & heavenly surrondings.During my visit in october 2013 from 12-10-13 to16-10-13,my main attraction for nainital was to see bhimtal again.I had been to bhimtal on 15-10-13 with the same nostalagic eagerness with a fear in mind that the great bhimtal might have lost its splendour due to commercial activities & more crowd.but after reaching there I thanked God that he has kept bhimtal in the same backdrop as I had seen earlier.Combination of cloud above the water,the vast expanse of water & a few boats surfing on the water gave a different dimension of the beauty of thr lake. Sitting over a bench by the side of the lake,time passed on eternally with a feeling that the landscape made by the almighty cant be compared with any human creations.I offer my prayers to god almighty to keep our very dearest bhimtal in the same posture designed by his holiness.

title: Nice lake. close to nature. Good if visitng for 1st time.
review: Bhimtal Lake is nice place to visit. You can reach to the aquarium at the center of the lake by boat.

title: calm place
review: calm place, boating was nice in silent, calm environment. even better when its cold and sunny.

title: beautiful lake
review: Its a great lake for boating. The only thing in Bhimtal actually.

title: Calm
review: Bhimtal Lake – Situated 22 km from the city center, Bhimtal Lake is the biggest lake of Nainital. It is named after the second Pandava brother Bhima in the Mahābhārata who was known for his prodigious strength. The lake, which is larger than Naini Lake, is approximately 22 km (14 mi) from Nainital at an altitude of 1,370 m (4,490 ft). There is an island in the lake with a popular restaurant on it. There is also a 17th-century temple complex, the Bhimeshwar, alongside a 40 ft (12 m) high dam at one end of the lake.

title: one more lake near nainital....
review: It is a big in size lake, surrounded by green hills. Beautiful place. Lake was clean. We enjoyed boating here. No motor boats are allowed in these lakes. There is a small island right in the middle of the lake. On that island, there is a small aquerium and kids enjoy watching different aquerium fish. They charge you Rs. 60 per head for aquerium visit, which is too high considering size of the aquerium.  Few temples around can be visited. Small food stalls around, provide you options for snacks, refreshments and even regular meals.

title: Beautiful, Quaint
review: Have a boat ride or enjoy some road side maggie overlooking the lake, and enjoying the weather.. It is much more peaceful than Nainital, yet offers a very scenic hill and valley view with the lake. I have seen the lake sparkle during the full moon nights, which is an out of the world experience.

title: A walk around the lake ( 4.5 kms ) is very refreshing,so is boating in the evening or mornings.
review: Bhim Tal is a cosy little town with a lake.Very good for a quiet holiday.Very good for treks up the mountains.

title: Bhimtal Lake
review: The Lake is small and as there was not much water it was dirty. History of the lake says that at the time of Vanvas Bhim created this lake by banging his fist on the earth. A small island in the middle has a museum .

title: Calm and Serene
review: There is nothing on the island in the center of the lake. It is a dirty sarkari acquarium now so dont bother about it. Just enjoy the boat ride. Boating in Naini Lake is just Rs. 160 whereas here the guy charged us Rs. 350. In hindsight I think we should have negotiated. I think you should negotiate for 100-150 bucks for a full tour and then give 30-50 bucks as tip

title: Dried up
review: It is almost non-existent... Hopefully this year its better...

title: Nice lake and nothing else to offer
review: There is not so much of things to do in Bhimtal. One can have boat ride, horse riding etc.

title: Beautiful Bhimtal lake,  but poor maintenance.
review: The Bhimtal lake is very beautiful, but the administration and tourism department are not maintaining it to international standards to attract tourists, so it look like a deserted and neglected place.

title: City of lakes
review: While staying in Bhimtal you should visit Bhimtal Lake, Naukuchia Tal, SaatTal. They are very close to Country Inn.Lakes are clean and you can do boating also.Also do not forget to eat Maggie Noodles from any shop around lakes.

title: Amazing View
review: A lake increases the the beauty of bhimtal, nothing to say on dislike part...

title: Good for View
review: Likes:

title: Clean and quiet lake!
review: It is just like any other lake on a hill station...the boating experience was good. The other nice thing about the lake was that it was very clean and quiet. There is a small island in the middle of the lake, which has a museum and a snack shop.

title: Drying up..deprived by administration
review: Lake is drying up .. and i could see polythene bags and litters around lake. Administration need to implement clear cut guideline on using food items especially food  which is in polythene bags must be banned in Complete Uttarakhand. This  will arrest  polythene menace

title: Nice Lake
review: A great boating option which is bit expensive and has an aquarium in the middle of the lake. Was an awesome experience to feed the ducks and have a closer look.

title: not so good
review: nothing special..there are much better lakes..specially the naukichiatal..that's amazing..the boat exprience is very average too

title: Bhimtal the largest lake in Uttarakhand
review: Bhimtal is the most beautiful lake I have ever seen in India. Located at a distance of about 300 kms from Delhi, the capital of India, it is located at a height of about 1270m above the sea level. The pristine water, surrounded by high Himalayan mountains presents a lovely picture. Serene and pure, it is pure bliss to watch. For more details, pl read my experience of visiting Bhimtal on http://globalhindustani.blogspot.in

title: Good boating on the lakes in Bhimtal and vicinity
review: The stay at Van Villas Resort was truly horrible and unforgettable!

title: silent beauty
review: if u want peace,

title: An average lake with limited options to do.
review: Apart from Nainital, all other tals(bhimtal, sat-tal etc.) are less visited by tourists. Due to this facilities are also limited. However the lake is big & nice.

title: Calm and quiet...raw natural environment !!
review: Bhimtal is a very 'nothing to do ' sort of destination. The resorts are also average to good quality...nothing 5 starish. We stayed in this resort called the Monolith Resorts, whch is overlooking the lake. This is a good spacious property, very nice cottages with terraces above. We loved the rooms as well as the sit out terraces... enjoyed our morning teas and time around dusk. The air is abs clean, crisp and cool with the fragrance of mountain flowers. Nothing concrete to do...just go there for a relaxed break from city life.

title: Weekend outing to Bhimtal/Nainital
review: I never had such a comfortable place on this price.

title: Bhimtal adventure & camping hot spot
review: If u r looking fr adventure ie paragliding , canoeing , boating , sailing or camping then look no further , abundant in all this plus mountain biking , fishing , fresh water lake swimming , nature walks , nature trails , loads places to stay expensive & cheap

title: excellent place
review: peaceful place.......very beautiful ! Must have local fruits available in the markets.........they are very tasty.

title: GOOD PLACE TO SEE
review: sathlake in bhimtal is good. Also, Nainital lake is superb. Boating and walking along the lake is pleasent experience. Then, horse riding in jungle to see the peak point. Quite adventurious. Old age people and children below 5 years shall be avoided.

title: Bhimtal lake
review: Bhimtal tal lake as compared to the other lakes has a mixed rating from my end. The lake per se not very impressive as it boudaries the incoming highway. The boat are not impressive as compared to that available in Naukuchiatal (boats with roof since it rained on day we visited) and Sattal (self paddle boats with roof). There is one vegetarian restaurant (Rituraj) near the lake which has good food, then again gets very crowded.Other food places did not attract that many people and was also not recommended by our local driver. The aquarium in the middle of the Bhimtal lake is worth a visit (the boat charge Rs 100 xtra for that visit) as it has small collection of fish. But one needs to check for electricity in the aquarium before one buys the ride, otherwise the Aquarium fishes are not properly visible. Overall ok place to visit since these are only things to do when one is on a trip to the hills

title: Bhimtal is nice stop over and central location to visit rest of tals in region
review: Bhimtal is quiet stopover for nainital and Almora traffic. The lake didn't have much water as the water is supplied to Haldwani below. Not many toursits were at the lake but boating facility is available
